item.title: Mistakenly Treated The Princess As A Concubine
item.description:
After the daughter of the former mistress of the Jing’an Marquis’s residence, Wen Zhuojin, fell from grace and lost all support after her uncle’s family declined, the engagement with the heir of the Rongguo Duke’s residence was snatched away by her stepsister.

After the broken engagement, rumors spread that Wen Zhuojin, who was said to be in mourning at home, disguised herself and went to a brothel in the western market of Yun Jing City. There, she bought the freedom of a young courtesan, taking her in and treating her like a precious jewel at a house she had prepared for her outside.

The world believed that the engagement had been stolen from Wen Zhuojin, but in fact, it was a marriage she had long wanted to cancel.

This was because Wen Zhuojin did not like men; she loved women, especially beautiful, mature women older than herself.

The beautiful woman she brought home perfectly met her criteria.

To support her lover, Wen Zhuojin worked hard in business, spending more on her lover’s clothes and living expenses than the courtiers in the palace.

However, Wen Zhuojin could not openly give her lover a formal title, which made her feel guilty toward her.

When she entered the palace to meet with the nobility, hoping to spend a fortune to secure a title for her beloved, Wen Zhuojin came face to face with the current Princess Royal.

The Princess Royal wore a hibiscus crown and a black and blue ceremonial robe, holding a dust whisk. Her demeanor was as cold as a snow-capped mountain, exuding aloof elegance and an unworldly air.

It was said that at the age of fifteen, the Princess Royal had helped her younger brother ascend the throne, quelled rebellions, subdued neighboring nations, and ruled decisively. She wielded unparalleled power and commanded universal reverence.

She was also the woman Wen Zhuojin feared most.

While everyone else knelt in respect, Wen Zhuojin stood frozen, trembling, staring in shock at the Princess.

Who could tell her why the Princess looked exactly like her delicate and helpless lover sister?!

————

At the age of twenty, Princess Royal Yan Qinglan took her vows as a Taoist nun, swearing never to marry. She never expected that, at twenty-six, she would be poisoned, lose her sight, and be sweetly coaxed by a soft-voiced girl who brought her home.

At that time, Yan Qinglan was trapped in a predicament. When she approached the girl, she noticed that the girl’s faint fragrance eased the pain of her poison flare-ups. She decided to follow the girl home to see what she was up to.

The girl indeed had intentions for Yan Qinglan—but not the kind Yan Qinglan imagined.

Exquisite meals, fine clothes, and extravagant luxury surrounded her. Within days, Princess Yan Qinglan was pampered, becoming even softer and more delicate, her beauty becoming truly unmatched.

And all the girl asked for in return was—

“Sister, kiss me.”

“Sister, hug me.”

“Sister, cuddle me.”

The sweet voice, with a tone of coquettishness, whispered and enticed her every day.

Slowly, Princess Yan Qinglan began to yearn for it. Even after her sight was restored, she continued to be the girl’s “concubine” while stirring up the political scene, vying for power and influence.

————

Wen Zhuojin, upon realizing that Princess Yan Qinglan and her beautiful sister were the same person, packed her things and fled overnight. But before she could leave the city gates, she was surrounded by the Imperial Guard.

Looking at the woman she once teased to tears and coaxed into embarrassing acts, now brimming with murderous intent, Wen Zhuojin was petrified.

“Ah Zhuo, if you leave, who will be my Empress?”

Just as Wen Zhuojin thought her life was over, Yan Qinglan suddenly embraced her and whispered in her ear—

item.title: Quick Transmigration: The Villain Is Too Pampered and Alluring
item.nameextend: ***The Beautiful Cannon Fodder in a Horror World 018***
item.description:
To survive, Sheng Nuan must traverse different worlds, playing the role of self-destructive cannon fodder while saving the darkest villains. These villains are cold-blooded, obsessive, and ruthless—capable of annihilating millions with a smile and destroying the world with a wave of their hand. Holding the cannon fodder’s script, Sheng Nuan is terrified…

Later:

A paranoid young man with a gloomy expression: “Nuan Nuan, you’re not allowed to go anywhere except by my side…”

The cold-blooded emperor whose face was stained with bl00d: “Nuan Nuan, for you, what does it matter if the empire falls?”

The demonized immortal with snow-white hair: “Nuan Nuan, you are my inner demon.”

The zombie king of the apocalypse with an unwavering gaze: “Nuan Nuan, it’s your choice—kill me, or save me.”

Sheng Nuan became even more panicked…

If you’re enjoying the story, please consider:

  1. Supporting the author
  2. Rating or leaving a review on NovelUpdates!

item.title: After Rebirth, I Married my Archenemy
item.description:
Before her death, Qun Qing hated the powerful official Lu Huating the most. She hated him for assisting the new emperor and for being cunning and insidious. She thought about him day and night, and tried her best to defeat him, but she was not his match. In the end, she became a cannon fodder in his hands.

After Qun Qing died, she saw the princess of the fallen country that she had protected with her life, crying and leaning on the new emperor’s chest: “Qung Qing is dead, what should I do?”
The new emperor kissed her: “You will be fine, just love me.”
The princess burst into tears, like a delicate flower under the rain: “Qung Qing is dead, Your Majesty is all I have left.”

When she opened his eyes, Qun Qing had woke up three years ago. She stood up, woodenly packed her bags, and regardless of the princess’s obstruction, took off her jade crown and walked away, dropped her female official’s wooden seal, turned around and left, leaving behind ten years of careful planning and treading on thin ice.

Restore the country? Pfft, restore it my foot.
——

The powerful minister Lu Huating is deeply cunning, ruthless, and dominates the power struggles of the court. Tired of the ugly nature of human hearts, his life has become dull and unfulfilling.

Looking back on his life, the only thing that left an impression was a female officer, a spy, whom he poisoned to death at the age of twenty-six.

For the love of the princess, she sacrificed his life for the country and schemed against him several times. In the end, she knelt in front of the Summer Palace, her facial expression remaining unchanged, with a look of resentment in her eyes, and sighed with a smile, “The king who wins is the ruler, and the one who loses is the defeated,” before raising her head and drinking to the last drop. Bl00d poured from her lips, a thin layer of vivid red.

When he opened his eyes again, Lu Huating returned to his twenty-three-year-old self.

Lu Huating looked at the documents under his command, and felt even more bored. He put down his brush and leaned on the back of the chair: “Where is the female official accompanying Crown Princess?”

“… She resigned. She asked me to tell My lord that she would not fight anymore.”

Lu Huating was silent for a while, and curled his lips coldly: “She said she won’t fight, so the fight is over?”

If you’re enjoying the story, please consider:

  1. Supporting the author
  2. Rating or leaving a review on NovelUpdates!

If you spot any mistakes in my translation, feel free to DM me on Discord (KatTL) or report it at Dragonholic Discord server.

item.title: Giving Interstellar Players a Horror Ghost Game Shock
item.description:
Ye Yuxi has lived in the interstellar world for 20 years and has just remembered that she is a proud transmigrator. Before her transmigration, she was an avid fan of horror games; after transmigrating, she coincidentally became a university student majoring in game design. In this interstellar world, where everyone is a tough, bloodthirsty warrior, violent and gory games are all the rage—most notably, games about hunting insectoid aliens and zombies. A search across the star network reveals no concept of supernatural horror games at all!

What does this mean? It means there is a vast untapped blue ocean of opportunity!

With this in mind, Ye Yuxi rolls up her sleeves and decides to give the interstellar residents a little shock with horror female ghost!

She launches Campus Nightmare, and interstellar players are terrified: “I’ve never been this scared of school!”

She releases Residential Area Battle Royale, and interstellar players cry: “This isn’t the battle royale I’ve played before!”

She rolls out A Loving Home, and interstellar players go crazy: “Where’s my quilt barrier? Is there any safe place in this world?!”

Later, after receiving the 10,086th complaint message from a terrified player, Ye Yuxi calmly accepts an interview: “At first, I just wanted to make a small game I’d enjoy. I never expected it to be so popular, so I ended up making a few more…”

Players who were scared out of their wits: “We thank you!”

item.title: Transmigrated into the Villain's Cannon Fodder Ex-Wife (Transmigrated into a Book)
item.description:
Lin Chu, an engineering student, was following a novel and found the villain character especially compelling. When she read the part where the villain was forced to marry a manipulative woman during his downfall, Lin Chu couldn’t help but criticize the green tea character.

Who would have expected that she’d black out, only to become that very same troublesome woman who regretted her marriage to the villain on their wedding day and ultimately got herself killed?

Lin Chu: “…”

Stay calm, don’t panic.

Looking at the villainous husband, injured and returning from the battlefield, Lin Chu thought she had found her chance to escape her tragic fate by clinging to his leg for survival…

item.title: Proof of the Demon Lord's Innocence
item.description:
“Trias Marigold is innocent. I’ll prove it.”
In the world of Flower Mail, every person is born with an inherent talent for a specific job. A young man bearing the Demon Lord job is subjugated and arrested, accused of plotting world conquest.

Freya Blossom, an eccentric lawyer from the Lotus Federation specializing in criminal cases, firmly believes in Demon Lord Trias Marigold’s innocence. Against the prevailing prejudice that all Demon Lords are evil, Freya diligently gathers evidence. Gradually revealed is a distorted world system, one that fears the “omnipotent Demon Lord possessing the power of all jobs” and maintains balance by branding him as evil.

People cannot choose their job abilities. Discriminated against simply for being born a Demon Lord, Trias is falsely accused of a mass murder committed by a band of thieves. To further incriminate him, a fabricated confession of his intent to conquer the world is produced.

By gaining the support of one of the heroes, who is vaguely aware of the truth and plagued by guilt, Freya succeeds in overturning the trial and rescuing Trias.

Trias joins the law firm operated by Freya and her paralegal partner, Techno. And so begins their boisterous and bright new life together in the office.

featuredImage.url: https://dragonholic.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/魔王陛下の無罪証明.jpg

item.title: I Have been Reincarnated As a Lazy, Arrogant Noble, but When I Destroyed The Scenario Through Effort, I Became The Most Powerful With Extraordinary Magical Power
item.description:
“Weiss Fancent”

A debased villainous noble with an arrogant attitude, embodying true evil. Before I realized it, I had been reincarnated as that man. This despicable scumbag, who despised effort and was beyond redemption, would eventually become a minion of the Demon Lord and be deceived, only to be executed.

“Noblesse Oblige.” This is the aristocratic academy game that I love.
But…
“I’ll shatter that kind of scenario.”
I will alter the path of destruction. As I started making efforts, with the help of those around me, my stats began to rise, and I enrolled in the academy, the stage of this story.
However, it is there that I realize.
“Am I… too strong?”

This is the story of a man reincarnated as a lazy noble, who breaks the scenario through relentless effort and becomes the most formidable.

item.title: I Have been Reincarnated As a Lazy, Arrogant Noble, but When I Destroyed The Scenario Through Effort, I Became The Most Powerful With Extraordinary Magical Power
item.description:

item.title: Red Dot
item.description:
“Every day, a recurring hellish dream. Junseong is stuck in a world that feels like an endless loop, much like a roguelike game. It’s a cursed world where he struggles every day. Two months have passed since he set foot in the zombie apocalypse world in his dreams. “Ha….” As soon as he woke up, his gaze was instinctively drawn to the internet broadcast that he habitually left on. -A major riot is occurring in some regions due to the current situation… Then, beep! A loud sound announcing a disaster alert echoed in Junseong’s head. Unconsciously picking up his phone along with the alarm sound, Junseong couldn’t hide his confused expression.
[10:44 AM] It was the exact time he had always woken up in his dream. Everything was just like his usual dreams. However, a man he had never seen in his dreams before, Do Hanseo, appeared right in front of Junseong. “I’ve been wanting to ask you something.”
“What?” As Junseong was about to reply, he felt a change in Hanseo’s gaze. The smile that had been on his lips disappeared. Consequently, Junseong felt a strong, cold, and sharp pressure, as if a dagger was piercing his throat. “Why do you look at me like that?” Feeling the strange pressure, Junseong, who had tightly sealed his lips for a moment, asked instead. “How am I… looking at you?”
“….” Instead of an immediate answer, Hanseo just gazed silently. Then, he showed the ‘fake smile’ he had been holding onto a little while ago. His clothes were too clean, his body had no wounds, and the smell of bl00d was so strong in comparison. When he took off his clothes, he could be sure. The scent of bl00d from the man named Do Hanseo was not from his ‘clothes’ but emanated from him.“

item.title: The Young Male Protagonist Who is Destined for Ruin Fell for Me
The Young Male Protagonist Who is Destined for Ruin Fell for Me
The Young Male Protagonist Who is Destined for Ruin Fell for Me
Giving Interstellar Players a Horror Ghost Game Shock
item.description:
Ye Yuxi has lived in the interstellar world for 20 years and has just remembered that she is a proud transmigrator. Before her transmigration, she was an avid fan of horror games; after transmigrating, she coincidentally became a university student majoring in game design. In this interstellar world, where everyone is a tough, bloodthirsty warrior, violent and gory games are all the rage—most notably, games about hunting insectoid aliens and zombies. A search across the star network reveals no concept of supernatural horror games at all!

What does this mean? It means there is a vast untapped blue ocean of opportunity!

With this in mind, Ye Yuxi rolls up her sleeves and decides to give the interstellar residents a little shock with horror female ghost!

She launches Campus Nightmare, and interstellar players are terrified: “I’ve never been this scared of school!”

She releases Residential Area Battle Royale, and interstellar players cry: “This isn’t the battle royale I’ve played before!”

She rolls out A Loving Home, and interstellar players go crazy: “Where’s my quilt barrier? Is there any safe place in this world?!”

Later, after receiving the 10,086th complaint message from a terrified player, Ye Yuxi calmly accepts an interview: “At first, I just wanted to make a small game I’d enjoy. I never expected it to be so popular, so I ended up making a few more…”

Players who were scared out of their wits: “We thank you!”

If you’re enjoying the story, please consider:

  1. Supporting the author
  2. Rating or leaving a review on NovelUpdates!

If you spot any mistakes in my translation, feel free to DM me on Discord (KatTL) or report it at Dragonholic Discord server.

If you enjoy my translations and want to sprinkle a little joy in my cup, you can treat me to a coffee on Ko-fi or support me at Patreon! Your support means the world to me! ☕💖

item.title: The Male Lead's Harem Belongs to Me (GL)
item.description:
Synopsis:

Jiang Han died from staying up too late reading a novel, and after her death, she found herself transported into the ancient melodramatic romance novel she had been reading.

The male lead is a cold and domineering prince, and the female lead is the prince’s long-cherished “white moonlight”. Unfortunately, the white moonlight has a lowly status, and the prince’s mother disapproves. The male lead goes to great lengths, enduring countless melodramatic events, heart-wrenching and physically exhausting, ultimately winning the heart of his beloved and achieving a happy ending. And Jiang Han is one of the cannon fodder female characters who, out of jealousy, targeted the male lead’s white moonlight.

Jiang Han, who traveled through time, said: “No way, I just want to be a salted fish and play mahjong every day.”

So when the male lead said: “I want to marry my white moonlight.”

Jiang Han: Marry! You must marry! The gifts are all ready.

The male lead said: “She is timid and frail. As the princess, you should take good care of her.”

Jiang Han: Take care! Must take care of !Tomorrow, I’ll have her live next to me!

The male lead said: “She’s too considerate. She won’t speak up about her needs, so you should be more accommodating to her.”

Jiang Han: Move! Must yield! Tomorrow, I will divorce you and give the title of princess to her!

••••

The next day, Jiang Han indeed handed him a divorce letter. The male lead, feeling complicated, signed it, but Jiang Han happily prepared to leave. Just as she reached the gate of the royal mansion, a group of concubines led by Bai Yueguang blocked her way.

Bai Yueguang: Sister Han, don’t go. Would you stay?

A group of concubines: Yeah, yeah, please don’t leave.

Jiang Han showed a troubled expression, and the male lead’s heart was filled with joy. Just as he was about to say a few words of persuasion, he saw Jiang Han decisively shake her head.

The male lead thought it was a pity. Before he could catch his breath, he saw the person he held dear, his “white moonlight,” take out a divorce agreement and coldly say to him, “Sign it. I want to leave with Sister Han.”

The male lead stared wide-eyed in disbelief, a mouthful of old bl00d choked in his chest. However, the next moment, his group of concubines gritted their teeth and said to Bai Yueguang: “Weiwei, you are being too ungrateful. Why did you prepare the divorce papers all by yourself without telling us?”

#My harem seems to have turned into my princess’s, what should I do#

#Is it too late to regret now#

One-on-one [highlight this], before the divorce, they were just pure revolutionary comrades and good friends. After the divorce, there will be romantic developments.

item.title: Honkai: Star Rail, My Journey with Tom
item.nameextend: ***Is It Too Late to Join the Stellaron Hunters Now?***
item.description:
“I got transported into Honkai: Star Rail?!”

Li Ye looked around, trying to make sense of his surroundings. Wait a minute…was he really aboard the Astral Express?

Something felt off. The place was eerily quiet. No familiar faces, no chatter… just him, all alone.

Frowning, he made his way toward the door when—ding!—a Warp screen popped up right in front of him.

At that moment, all his unease melted away.

“Alright, looks like I’ve got some hacks!” Without hesitation, Li Ye hit the warp button.

He planned to pull for a top-tier waifu—either someone overpowered, someone drop-dead gorgeous, or, ideally, both.

But just as golden light burst from the door, signaling a high-rank pull…

A blue-gray cat casually strolled out, standing on two legs with a tiny satchel slung over its shoulder.

Li Ye blinked. “Wait a second… Is that—”

TOM?! TOM THE CAT?!

item.title: Quick Transmigration: The Villain Is Too Pampered and Alluring
item.nameextend: ***The Beautiful Cannon Fodder in a Horror World 008***
item.description:
To survive, Sheng Nuan must traverse different worlds, playing the role of self-destructive cannon fodder while saving the darkest villains. These villains are cold-blooded, obsessive, and ruthless—capable of annihilating millions with a smile and destroying the world with a wave of their hand. Holding the cannon fodder’s script, Sheng Nuan is terrified…

Later:

A paranoid young man with a gloomy expression: “Nuan Nuan, you’re not allowed to go anywhere except by my side…”

The cold-blooded emperor whose face was stained with bl00d: “Nuan Nuan, for you, what does it matter if the empire falls?”

The demonized immortal with snow-white hair: “Nuan Nuan, you are my inner demon.”

The zombie king of the apocalypse with an unwavering gaze: “Nuan Nuan, it’s your choice—kill me, or save me.”

Sheng Nuan became even more panicked…

Before her transmigration, she was an avid fan of horror games; after transmigrating, she coincidentally became a university student majoring in game design. In this interstellar world, where everyone is a tough, bloodthirsty warrior, violent and gory games are all the rage—most notably, games about hunting insectoid aliens and zombies. A search across the star network reveals no concept of supernatural horror games at all!

What does this mean? It means there is a vast untapped blue ocean of opportunity!

With this in mind, Ye Yuxi rolls up her sleeves and decides to give the interstellar residents a little shock with horror female ghost!

She launches Campus Nightmare, and interstellar players are terrified: “I’ve never been this scared of school!”

She releases Residential Area Battle Royale, and interstellar players cry: “This isn’t the battle royale I’ve played before!”

She rolls out A Loving Home, and interstellar players go crazy: “Where’s my quilt barrier? Is there any safe place in this world?!”

Later, after receiving the 10,086th complaint message from a terrified player, Ye Yuxi calmly accepts an interview: “At first, I just wanted to make a small game I’d enjoy. I never expected it to be so popular, so I ended up making a few more…”

Players who were scared out of their wits: “We thank you!”

If you’re enjoying the story, please consider:

  1. Supporting the author
  2. Rating or leaving a review on NovelUpdates!

If you spot any mistakes in my translation, feel free to DM me on Discord (KatTL) or report it at Dragonholic Discord server.

item.title: The Male Lead's Harem Belongs to Me (GL)
item.description:
Synopsis:

Jiang Han died from staying up too late reading a novel, and after her death, she found herself transported into the ancient melodramatic romance novel she had been reading.

The male lead is a cold and domineering prince, and the female lead is the prince’s long-cherished “white moonlight”. Unfortunately, the white moonlight has a lowly status, and the prince’s mother disapproves. The male lead goes to great lengths, enduring countless melodramatic events, heart-wrenching and physically exhausting, ultimately winning the heart of his beloved and achieving a happy ending. And Jiang Han is one of the cannon fodder female characters who, out of jealousy, targeted the male lead’s white moonlight.

Jiang Han, who traveled through time, said: “No way, I just want to be a salted fish and play mahjong every day.”

So when the male lead said: “I want to marry my white moonlight.”

Jiang Han: Marry! You must marry! The gifts are all ready.

The male lead said: “She is timid and frail. As the princess, you should take good care of her.”

Jiang Han: Take care! Must take care of !Tomorrow, I’ll have her live next to me!

The male lead said: “She’s too considerate. She won’t speak up about her needs, so you should be more accommodating to her.”

Jiang Han: Move! Must yield! Tomorrow, I will divorce you and give the title of princess to her!

••••

The next day, Jiang Han indeed handed him a divorce letter. The male lead, feeling complicated, signed it, but Jiang Han happily prepared to leave. Just as she reached the gate of the royal mansion, a group of concubines led by Bai Yueguang blocked her way.

Bai Yueguang: Sister Han, don’t go. Would you stay?

A group of concubines: Yeah, yeah, please don’t leave.

Jiang Han showed a troubled expression, and the male lead’s heart was filled with joy. Just as he was about to say a few words of persuasion, he saw Jiang Han decisively shake her head.

The male lead thought it was a pity. Before he could catch his breath, he saw the person he held dear, his “white moonlight,” take out a divorce agreement and coldly say to him, “Sign it. I want to leave with Sister Han.”

The male lead stared wide-eyed in disbelief, a mouthful of old bl00d choked in his chest. However, the next moment, his group of concubines gritted their teeth and said to Bai Yueguang: “Weiwei, you are being too ungrateful. Why did you prepare the divorce papers all by yourself without telling us?”

#My harem seems to have turned into my princess’s, what should I do#

#Is it too late to regret now#

One-on-one [highlight this], before the divorce, they were just pure revolutionary comrades and good friends. After the divorce, there will be romantic developments.

item.title: Honkai: Star Rail, My Journey with Tom
item.description:
“I got transported into Honkai: Star Rail?!”

Li Ye looked around, trying to make sense of his surroundings. Wait a minute…was he really aboard the Astral Express?

Something felt off. The place was eerily quiet. No familiar faces, no chatter… just him, all alone.

Frowning, he made his way toward the door when—ding!—a Warp screen popped up right in front of him.

At that moment, all his unease melted away.

“Alright, looks like I’ve got some hacks!” Without hesitation, Li Ye hit the warp button.

He planned to pull for a top-tier waifu—either someone overpowered, someone drop-dead gorgeous, or, ideally, both.

But just as golden light burst from the door, signaling a high-rank pull…

A blue-gray cat casually strolled out, standing on two legs with a tiny satchel slung over its shoulder.

Li Ye blinked. “Wait a second… Is that—”

TOM?! TOM THE CAT?!

item.title: Quick Transmigration: The Villain Is Too Pampered and Alluring
item.description:
To survive, Sheng Nuan must traverse different worlds, playing the role of self-destructive cannon fodder while saving the darkest villains. These villains are cold-blooded, obsessive, and ruthless—capable of annihilating millions with a smile and destroying the world with a wave of their hand. Holding the cannon fodder’s script, Sheng Nuan is terrified…

Later:

A paranoid young man with a gloomy expression: “Nuan Nuan, you’re not allowed to go anywhere except by my side…”

The cold-blooded emperor whose face was stained with bl00d: “Nuan Nuan, for you, what does it matter if the empire falls?”

The demonized immortal with snow-white hair: “Nuan Nuan, you are my inner demon.”

The zombie king of the apocalypse with an unwavering gaze: “Nuan Nuan, it’s your choice—kill me, or save me.”

Sheng Nuan became even more panicked…

If you’re enjoying the story, please consider:

  1. Supporting the author
  2. Rating or leaving a review on NovelUpdates!

item.title: After Rebirth, I Married my Archenemy
item.nameextend: ***I just gave you a little push***
item.description:
Before her death, Qun Qing hated the powerful official Lu Huating the most. She hated him for assisting the new emperor and for being cunning and insidious. She thought about him day and night, and tried her best to defeat him, but she was not his match. In the end, she became a cannon fodder in his hands.

After Qun Qing died, she saw the princess of the fallen country that she had protected with her life, crying and leaning on the new emperor’s chest: “Qung Qing is dead, what should I do?”
The new emperor kissed her: “You will be fine, just love me.”
The princess burst into tears, like a delicate flower under the rain: “Qung Qing is dead, Your Majesty is all I have left.”

When she opened his eyes, Qun Qing had woke up three years ago. She stood up, woodenly packed her bags, and regardless of the princess’s obstruction, took off her jade crown and walked away, dropped her female official’s wooden seal, turned around and left, leaving behind ten years of careful planning and treading on thin ice.

Restore the country? Pfft, restore it my foot.
——

The powerful minister Lu Huating is deeply cunning, ruthless, and dominates the power struggles of the court. Tired of the ugly nature of human hearts, his life has become dull and unfulfilling.

Looking back on his life, the only thing that left an impression was a female officer, a spy, whom he poisoned to death at the age of twenty-six.

For the love of the princess, she sacrificed his life for the country and schemed against him several times. In the end, she knelt in front of the Summer Palace, her facial expression remaining unchanged, with a look of resentment in her eyes, and sighed with a smile, “The king who wins is the ruler, and the one who loses is the defeated,” before raising her head and drinking to the last drop. Bl00d poured from her lips, a thin layer of vivid red.

When he opened his eyes again, Lu Huating returned to his twenty-three-year-old self.

Lu Huating looked at the documents under his command, and felt even more bored. He put down his brush and leaned on the back of the chair: “Where is the female official accompanying Crown Princess?”

“… She resigned. She asked me to tell My lord that she would not fight anymore.”

Lu Huating was silent for a while, and curled his lips coldly: “She said she won’t fight, so the fight is over?”

If you’re enjoying the story, please consider:

  1. Supporting the author
  2. Rating or leaving a review on NovelUpdates!

If you spot any mistakes in my translation, feel free to DM me on Discord (KatTL) or report it at Dragonholic Discord server.

Release schedule: 1 chapter will be unlocked every 3 days. 1-2 advance chapters will be updated only on weekdays.

If you enjoy my translations and want to sprinkle a little joy in my cup, you can treat me to a coffee on Ko-fi or support me at Patreon! Your support means the world to me! ☕💖

item.title: When the Mid-Boss Villainous Noble Recalls Memories of a Past Life and Gains Game Knowledge I Will Never Accept a Future Where I'm Called the Jealous Earl
Transmigrated into the Villain's Cannon Fodder Ex-Wife (Transmigrated into a Book)
item.description:
Lin Chu, an engineering student, was following a novel and found the villain character especially compelling. When she read the part where the villain was forced to marry a manipulative woman during his downfall, Lin Chu couldn’t help but criticize the green tea character.

Who would have expected that she’d black out, only to become that very same troublesome woman who regretted her marriage to the villain on their wedding day and ultimately got herself killed?

Lin Chu: “…”

Stay calm, don’t panic.

Looking at the villainous husband, injured and returning from the battlefield, Lin Chu thought she had found her chance to escape her tragic fate by clinging to his leg for survival…

If you’re enjoying the story, please consider:

  1. Supporting the author

item.title: Quick Transmigration: The Villain Is Too Pampered and Alluring
item.description:
To survive, Sheng Nuan must traverse different worlds, playing the role of self-destructive cannon fodder while saving the darkest villains. These villains are cold-blooded, obsessive, and ruthless—capable of annihilating millions with a smile and destroying the world with a wave of their hand. Holding the cannon fodder’s script, Sheng Nuan is terrified…

Later:

A paranoid young man with a gloomy expression: “Nuan Nuan, you’re not allowed to go anywhere except by my side…”

The cold-blooded emperor whose face was stained with bl00d: “Nuan Nuan, for you, what does it matter if the empire falls?”

The demonized immortal with snow-white hair: “Nuan Nuan, you are my inner demon.”

The zombie king of the apocalypse with an unwavering gaze: “Nuan Nuan, it’s your choice—kill me, or save me.”

Sheng Nuan became even more panicked…

item.title: Mistakenly Treated The Princess As A Concubine
item.description:
After the daughter of the former mistress of the Jing’an Marquis’s residence, Wen Zhuojin, fell from grace and lost all support after her uncle’s family declined, the engagement with the heir of the Rongguo Duke’s residence was snatched away by her stepsister.

After the broken engagement, rumors spread that Wen Zhuojin, who was said to be in mourning at home, disguised herself and went to a brothel in the western market of Yun Jing City. There, she bought the freedom of a young courtesan, taking her in and treating her like a precious jewel at a house she had prepared for her outside.

The world believed that the engagement had been stolen from Wen Zhuojin, but in fact, it was a marriage she had long wanted to cancel.

This was because Wen Zhuojin did not like men; she loved women, especially beautiful, mature women older than herself.

The beautiful woman she brought home perfectly met her criteria.

To support her lover, Wen Zhuojin worked hard in business, spending more on her lover’s clothes and living expenses than the courtiers in the palace.

However, Wen Zhuojin could not openly give her lover a formal title, which made her feel guilty toward her.

When she entered the palace to meet with the nobility, hoping to spend a fortune to secure a title for her beloved, Wen Zhuojin came face to face with the current Princess Royal.

The Princess Royal wore a hibiscus crown and a black and blue ceremonial robe, holding a dust whisk. Her demeanor was as cold as a snow-capped mountain, exuding aloof elegance and an unworldly air.

It was said that at the age of fifteen, the Princess Royal had helped her younger brother ascend the throne, quelled rebellions, subdued neighboring nations, and ruled decisively. She wielded unparalleled power and commanded universal reverence.

She was also the woman Wen Zhuojin feared most.

While everyone else knelt in respect, Wen Zhuojin stood frozen, trembling, staring in shock at the Princess.

Who could tell her why the Princess looked exactly like her delicate and helpless lover sister?!

————

At the age of twenty, Princess Royal Yan Qinglan took her vows as a Taoist nun, swearing never to marry. She never expected that, at twenty-six, she would be poisoned, lose her sight, and be sweetly coaxed by a soft-voiced girl who brought her home.

At that time, Yan Qinglan was trapped in a predicament. When she approached the girl, she noticed that the girl’s faint fragrance eased the pain of her poison flare-ups. She decided to follow the girl home to see what she was up to.

The girl indeed had intentions for Yan Qinglan—but not the kind Yan Qinglan imagined.

Exquisite meals, fine clothes, and extravagant luxury surrounded her. Within days, Princess Yan Qinglan was pampered, becoming even softer and more delicate, her beauty becoming truly unmatched.

And all the girl asked for in return was—

“Sister, kiss me.”

“Sister, hug me.”

“Sister, cuddle me.”

The sweet voice, with a tone of coquettishness, whispered and enticed her every day.

Slowly, Princess Yan Qinglan began to yearn for it. Even after her sight was restored, she continued to be the girl’s “concubine” while stirring up the political scene, vying for power and influence.

————

Wen Zhuojin, upon realizing that Princess Yan Qinglan and her beautiful sister were the same person, packed her things and fled overnight. But before she could leave the city gates, she was surrounded by the Imperial Guard.

Looking at the woman she once teased to tears and coaxed into embarrassing acts, now brimming with murderous intent, Wen Zhuojin was petrified.

“Ah Zhuo, if you leave, who will be my Empress?”

Just as Wen Zhuojin thought her life was over, Yan Qinglan suddenly embraced her and whispered in her ear—

item.title: Quick Transmigration: The Villain Is Too Pampered and Alluring
item.description:
To survive, Sheng Nuan must traverse different worlds, playing the role of self-destructive cannon fodder while saving the darkest villains. These villains are cold-blooded, obsessive, and ruthless—capable of annihilating millions with a smile and destroying the world with a wave of their hand. Holding the cannon fodder’s script, Sheng Nuan is terrified…

Later:

A paranoid young man with a gloomy expression: “Nuan Nuan, you’re not allowed to go anywhere except by my side…”

The cold-blooded emperor whose face was stained with bl00d: “Nuan Nuan, for you, what does it matter if the empire falls?”

The demonized immortal with snow-white hair: “Nuan Nuan, you are my inner demon.”

The zombie king of the apocalypse with an unwavering gaze: “Nuan Nuan, it’s your choice—kill me, or save me.”

Sheng Nuan became even more panicked…

Holding the cannon fodder’s script, Sheng Nuan is terrified…

Later:

A paranoid young man with a gloomy expression: “Nuan Nuan, you’re not allowed to go anywhere except by my side…”

The cold-blooded emperor whose face was stained with bl00d: “Nuan Nuan, for you, what does it matter if the empire falls?”

The demonized immortal with snow-white hair: “Nuan Nuan, you are my inner demon.”

The zombie king of the apocalypse with an unwavering gaze: “Nuan Nuan, it’s your choice—kill me, or save me.”

Sheng Nuan became even more panicked…

item.title: Mistakenly Treated The Princess As A Concubine
item.description:
After the daughter of the former mistress of the Jing’an Marquis’s residence, Wen Zhuojin, fell from grace and lost all support after her uncle’s family declined, the engagement with the heir of the Rongguo Duke’s residence was snatched away by her stepsister.

After the broken engagement, rumors spread that Wen Zhuojin, who was said to be in mourning at home, disguised herself and went to a brothel in the western market of Yun Jing City. There, she bought the freedom of a young courtesan, taking her in and treating her like a precious jewel at a house she had prepared for her outside.

The world believed that the engagement had been stolen from Wen Zhuojin, but in fact, it was a marriage she had long wanted to cancel.

This was because Wen Zhuojin did not like men; she loved women, especially beautiful, mature women older than herself.

The beautiful woman she brought home perfectly met her criteria.

To support her lover, Wen Zhuojin worked hard in business, spending more on her lover’s clothes and living expenses than the courtiers in the palace.

However, Wen Zhuojin could not openly give her lover a formal title, which made her feel guilty toward her.

When she entered the palace to meet with the nobility, hoping to spend a fortune to secure a title for her beloved, Wen Zhuojin came face to face with the current Princess Royal.

The Princess Royal wore a hibiscus crown and a black and blue ceremonial robe, holding a dust whisk. Her demeanor was as cold as a snow-capped mountain, exuding aloof elegance and an unworldly air.

It was said that at the age of fifteen, the Princess Royal had helped her younger brother ascend the throne, quelled rebellions, subdued neighboring nations, and ruled decisively. She wielded unparalleled power and commanded universal reverence.

She was also the woman Wen Zhuojin feared most.

While everyone else knelt in respect, Wen Zhuojin stood frozen, trembling, staring in shock at the Princess.

Who could tell her why the Princess looked exactly like her delicate and helpless lover sister?!

————

At the age of twenty, Princess Royal Yan Qinglan took her vows as a Taoist nun, swearing never to marry. She never expected that, at twenty-six, she would be poisoned, lose her sight, and be sweetly coaxed by a soft-voiced girl who brought her home.

At that time, Yan Qinglan was trapped in a predicament. When she approached the girl, she noticed that the girl’s faint fragrance eased the pain of her poison flare-ups. She decided to follow the girl home to see what she was up to.

The girl indeed had intentions for Yan Qinglan—but not the kind Yan Qinglan imagined.

Exquisite meals, fine clothes, and extravagant luxury surrounded her. Within days, Princess Yan Qinglan was pampered, becoming even softer and more delicate, her beauty becoming truly unmatched.

And all the girl asked for in return was—

“Sister, kiss me.”

“Sister, hug me.”

“Sister, cuddle me.”

The sweet voice, with a tone of coquettishness, whispered and enticed her every day.

Slowly, Princess Yan Qinglan began to yearn for it. Even after her sight was restored, she continued to be the girl’s “concubine” while stirring up the political scene, vying for power and influence.

————

Wen Zhuojin, upon realizing that Princess Yan Qinglan and her beautiful sister were the same person, packed her things and fled overnight. But before she could leave the city gates, she was surrounded by the Imperial Guard.

Looking at the woman she once teased to tears and coaxed into embarrassing acts, now brimming with murderous intent, Wen Zhuojin was petrified.

“Ah Zhuo, if you leave, who will be my Empress?”

Just as Wen Zhuojin thought her life was over, Yan Qinglan suddenly embraced her and whispered in her ear—

item.title: When the Mid-Boss Villainous Noble Recalls Memories of a Past Life and Gains Game Knowledge I Will Never Accept a Future Where I'm Called the Jealous Earl
Guide to the Fallen World
item.description:
Jeong Yeo-won wakes up from a frozen state.

When I opened my eyes, I found myself woke up 500 years later in a world that had already been destroyed.

A monster suddenly appears from the gate.
‘Esper’, a godlike creature who has awakened his powers follow its lead.

And the world is completely different from the past. Humans are no longer the masters of the Earth.

The Espers, who are supposed to hunt monsters and protect the city, are actually leading the world to further destruction due to their rampage. The ‘Guides’ that could calm the Espers have already disappeared.

But then.

“I’m a guide?”

The only guide who miraculously woke up in a discarded hibernation capsule.

Yeo-won creates a guiding drug that slows down the rampage and distributes it around the world.

Thus, the world is one step away from destruction,
but now she must protect herself from the espers who seek to find and possess the guide.

A drop of water that falls on dry land,

Will it be able to moisten the earth, or will it dry up and disappear in the heat.

item.title: If You Want To Frame Me As a Villainess, I Will Be The Villainess. However.
item.description: I, Christiane, am the fiancee of the Crown Prince of the Zebia Kingdom. However, at the party meant to celebrate my graduation from the academy, i find myself accused of wrongdoing by my fiance, Fabian. Beside him, clinging to him with a frightened look, is Baron Noelia. Lowering my head, trembling slightly, i lift my face to meet their gazes. To become the villainess.

featuredImage.url: https://dragonholic.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/悪役令嬢に仕立て上げたいのならば、悪役令嬢になってあげましょう。ただし。.jpg

item.title: The Young Male Protagonist Who is Destined for Ruin Fell for Me
The Young Male Protagonist Who is Destined for Ruin Fell for Me
The Wind Heard Her Confession
item.description:
Synopsis:

Lin Yuran never would have thought that the client sitting across from her, forcing them both to work together, was the high school classmate she had rejected long ago, Chi Ye.

The two maintained a distant yet courteous relationship, keeping their distance as they worked together.

However, Lin Yuran gradually felt something wasn’t quite right.

For example, why did this man insist on her working at his company instead of her own studio? And moreover, how come her office just so happened to be directly opposite his?

Another instance, when Lin Yuran accepted a ride in another man’s Rolls-Royce Phantom, Chi Ye only sighed, “I thought I’d never get to ride a luxury car like this in my life.”

The very next day, Chi Ye’s car changed to a Bentley, then Bugatti, followed by Koenigsegg… Another time, Lin Yuran accidentally stumbled upon Chi Ye’s Baidu profile and discovered that her favorite lollipop factory was registered under his name.

But rumor had it that the factory closed five years ago, and that some mysterious big shot loved eating these lollipops, so he bought the factory and continued production regardless of profit or loss, no matter what the situation.

Numerous clues led Lin Yuran to suspect—

Chi Ye still liked her?

Little did she know, even their second encounter was part of his plan.

Yet Chi Ye remained unaware that on that sweltering afternoon six years ago, Lin Yuran had quietly watched his lonely figure from afar and murmured softly, “If we meet again someday, I hope I can respond to you.”

That year, only the wind heard her confession.

item.title: The Young Marquis Regrets Too Late
item.description:
Jiang Jingchun, who was the cherished daughter of a minister’s household, grew up as a true pampered young miss. She could have whatever she desired, except for one thing: her cousin, Gu Huaisheng, the young marquis of a marquis’ residence.

Gu Huaisheng, who was the son of a marquis’ household, was like snow on the eaves or the moon outside the window—elegant, untouchable, and the most outstanding young man in his family. He was far beyond anyone’s reach.

Jiang Jingchun tried everything to win his favour. She found out the type of person he seemed to admire and transformed herself from an outspoken and willful young lady into someone obedient and meek in his presence.

Yet no matter how hard she tried, Gu Huaisheng would barely spare her a glance.

The frustrated and desperate Jiang Jingchun followed a terrible idea from her closest friend. One day, while he wasn’t paying attention, she leaned in to kiss his cheek. But just as she moved closer, Gu Huaisheng turned his head, and their lips accidentally met…

The soft touch of their lips startled her, but before Jiang Jingchun could even blush, Gu Huaisheng shoved her away harshly. With a cold and angry glare, he spat, “Shameless,” and strode away without a backward glance.

That one push left Jiang Jingchun completely stunned and shattered her girlish infatuation into pieces.

Misfortunes never come singly. On the same day, news arrived at the minister’s household: the true daughter of their family had been found.

Jiang Jingchun had lived as the family’s treasured daughter for over a decade. Only then did she learn that she was, in fact, a fake daughter.

At the true daughter’s formal recognition banquet, Jiang Jingchun witnessed something that cut deeper than anything before. Gu Huaisheng, who had always been cold and distant to her, now stood before the true daughter and treated her gently and warmly.

He could smile, she realised, but not for her.

From beginning to end, she had been nothing but a colossal joke.

Gu Huaisheng was cruel. She swore she would never like him again.

After the true daughter of the Jiang family returned, Jiang Jingchun’s heart turned to ashes. She calmly accepted the marriage that the Jiang family arranged for her.

But before the betrothal was finalised, Gu Huaisheng appeared at her family residence’s doorstep.

On a day of heavy rain, he stood in the downpour under an umbrella, gripping her delicate wrist and refusing to let go. He said, “He is not a good man.”

Jiang Jingchun laughed and shook off his hand. “He is still far kinder than you, Cousin.”

Under Jiang Jingchun’s icy gaze, Gu Huaisheng tensed up. A sharp ache spread through his chest.

For the first time, the proud and aloof young marquis understood what it truly meant to feel regret.

The demonized immortal with snow-white hair: “Nuan Nuan, you are my inner demon.”

The zombie king of the apocalypse with an unwavering gaze: “Nuan Nuan, it’s your choice—kill me, or save me.”

Sheng Nuan became even more panicked…

If you’re enjoying the story, please consider:

  1. Supporting the author
  2. Rating or leaving a review on NovelUpdates!

If you spot any mistakes in my translation, feel free to DM me on Discord (cannibalturtle) or report it in the Dragonholic Discord server. Join the server and get your role to get the fastest and most recent chapter release notifications and announcements.

Release schedule: Advance chapters will be updated daily at 8 PM (UTC+8).

If you love what I do, you can buy me coffee on ko-fi to show your support.

item.title: The Young Marquis Regrets Too Late
item.description:
Jiang Jingchun, who was the cherished daughter of a minister’s household, grew up as a true pampered young miss. She could have whatever she desired, except for one thing: her cousin, Gu Huaisheng, the young marquis of a marquis’ residence.

Gu Huaisheng, who was the son of a marquis’ household, was like snow on the eaves or the moon outside the window—elegant, untouchable, and the most outstanding young man in his family. He was far beyond anyone’s reach.

Jiang Jingchun tried everything to win his favour. She found out the type of person he seemed to admire and transformed herself from an outspoken and willful young lady into someone obedient and meek in his presence.

Yet no matter how hard she tried, Gu Huaisheng would barely spare her a glance.

The frustrated and desperate Jiang Jingchun followed a terrible idea from her closest friend. One day, while he wasn’t paying attention, she leaned in to kiss his cheek. But just as she moved closer, Gu Huaisheng turned his head, and their lips accidentally met…

The soft touch of their lips startled her, but before Jiang Jingchun could even blush, Gu Huaisheng shoved her away harshly. With a cold and angry glare, he spat, “Shameless,” and strode away without a backward glance.

That one push left Jiang Jingchun completely stunned and shattered her girlish infatuation into pieces.

Misfortunes never come singly. On the same day, news arrived at the minister’s household: the true daughter of their family had been found.

Jiang Jingchun had lived as the family’s treasured daughter for over a decade. Only then did she learn that she was, in fact, a fake daughter.

At the true daughter’s formal recognition banquet, Jiang Jingchun witnessed something that cut deeper than anything before. Gu Huaisheng, who had always been cold and distant to her, now stood before the true daughter and treated her gently and warmly.

He could smile, she realised, but not for her.

From beginning to end, she had been nothing but a colossal joke.

Gu Huaisheng was cruel. She swore she would never like him again.

After the true daughter of the Jiang family returned, Jiang Jingchun’s heart turned to ashes. She calmly accepted the marriage that the Jiang family arranged for her.

But before the betrothal was finalised, Gu Huaisheng appeared at her family residence’s doorstep.

On a day of heavy rain, he stood in the downpour under an umbrella, gripping her delicate wrist and refusing to let go. He said, “He is not a good man.”

Jiang Jingchun laughed and shook off his hand. “He is still far kinder than you, Cousin.”

Under Jiang Jingchun’s icy gaze, Gu Huaisheng tensed up. A sharp ache spread through his chest.

For the first time, the proud and aloof young marquis understood what it truly meant to feel regret.

item.title: If You Want To Frame Me As a Villainess, I Will Be The Villainess. However.
item.description: I, Christiane, am the fiancee of the Crown Prince of the Zebia Kingdom. However, at the party meant to celebrate my graduation from the academy, i find myself accused of wrongdoing by my fiance, Fabian. Beside him, clinging to him with a frightened look, is Baron Noelia. Lowering my head, trembling slightly, i lift my face to meet their gazes. To become the villainess.

featuredImage.url: https://dragonholic.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/悪役令嬢に仕立て上げたいのならば、悪役令嬢になってあげましょう。ただし。.jpg

item.title: Quick Transmigration: The Villain Is Too Pampered and Alluring
item.description:
To survive, Sheng Nuan must traverse different worlds, playing the role of self-destructive cannon fodder while saving the darkest villains. These villains are cold-blooded, obsessive, and ruthless—capable of annihilating millions with a smile and destroying the world with a wave of their hand. Holding the cannon fodder’s script, Sheng Nuan is terrified…

Later:

A paranoid young man with a gloomy expression: “Nuan Nuan, you’re not allowed to go anywhere except by my side…”

The cold-blooded emperor whose face was stained with bl00d: “Nuan Nuan, for you, what does it matter if the empire falls?”

The demonized immortal with snow-white hair: “Nuan Nuan, you are my inner demon.”

The zombie king of the apocalypse with an unwavering gaze: “Nuan Nuan, it’s your choice—kill me, or save me.”

Sheng Nuan became even more panicked…

If you’re enjoying the story, please consider:

  1. Supporting the author
  2. Rating or leaving a review on NovelUpdates!

If you spot any mistakes in my translation, feel free to DM me on Discord (cannibalturtle) or report it in the Dragonholic Discord server. Join the server and get your role to get the fastest and most recent chapter release notifications and announcements.

Release schedule: Advance chapters will be updated daily at 8 PM (UTC+8).

If you love what I do, you can buy me coffee on ko-fi to show your support.

These villains are cold-blooded, obsessive, and ruthless—capable of annihilating millions with a smile and destroying the world with a wave of their hand. Holding the cannon fodder’s script, Sheng Nuan is terrified…

Later:

A paranoid young man with a gloomy expression: “Nuan Nuan, you’re not allowed to go anywhere except by my side…”

The cold-blooded emperor whose face was stained with bl00d: “Nuan Nuan, for you, what does it matter if the empire falls?”

The demonized immortal with snow-white hair: “Nuan Nuan, you are my inner demon.”

The zombie king of the apocalypse with an unwavering gaze: “Nuan Nuan, it’s your choice—kill me, or save me.”

Sheng Nuan became even more panicked…

If you’re enjoying the story, please consider:

  1. Supporting the author

item.title: The Young Male Protagonist Who is Destined for Ruin Fell for Me
The Young Male Protagonist Who is Destined for Ruin Fell for Me
The Young Male Protagonist Who is Destined for Ruin Fell for Me
After Rebirth, I Married my Archenemy
item.nameextend: ***You wouldn’t be lenient towards me, would you?***
item.description:
Before her death, Qun Qing hated the powerful official Lu Huating the most. She hated him for assisting the new emperor and for being cunning and insidious. She thought about him day and night, and tried her best to defeat him, but she was not his match. In the end, she became a cannon fodder in his hands.

After Qun Qing died, she saw the princess of the fallen country that she had protected with her life, crying and leaning on the new emperor’s chest: “Qung Qing is dead, what should I do?”
The new emperor kissed her: “You will be fine, just love me.”
The princess burst into tears, like a delicate flower under the rain: “Qung Qing is dead, Your Majesty is all I have left.”

When she opened his eyes, Qun Qing had woke up three years ago. She stood up, woodenly packed her bags, and regardless of the princess’s obstruction, took off her jade crown and walked away, dropped her female official’s wooden seal, turned around and left, leaving behind ten years of careful planning and treading on thin ice.

Restore the country? Pfft, restore it my foot.
——

The powerful minister Lu Huating is deeply cunning, ruthless, and dominates the power struggles of the court. Tired of the ugly nature of human hearts, his life has become dull and unfulfilling.

Looking back on his life, the only thing that left an impression was a female officer, a spy, whom he poisoned to death at the age of twenty-six.

For the love of the princess, she sacrificed his life for the country and schemed against him several times. In the end, she knelt in front of the Summer Palace, her facial expression remaining unchanged, with a look of resentment in her eyes, and sighed with a smile, “The king who wins is the ruler, and the one who loses is the defeated,” before raising her head and drinking to the last drop. Bl00d poured from her lips, a thin layer of vivid red.

When he opened his eyes again, Lu Huating returned to his twenty-three-year-old self.

Lu Huating looked at the documents under his command, and felt even more bored. He put down his brush and leaned on the back of the chair: “Where is the female official accompanying Crown Princess?”

“… She resigned. She asked me to tell My lord that she would not fight anymore.”

Lu Huating was silent for a while, and curled his lips coldly: “She said she won’t fight, so the fight is over?”

If you’re enjoying the story, please consider:

  1. Supporting the author
  2. Rating or leaving a review on NovelUpdates!

If you spot any mistakes in my translation, feel free to DM me on Discord (KatTL) or report it at Dragonholic Discord server.

Release schedule: 1 chapter will be unlocked every 3 days. 1-2 advance chapters will be updated only on weekdays.

If you enjoy my translations and want to sprinkle a little joy in my cup, you can treat me to a coffee on Ko-fi or support me at Patreon! Your support means the world to me! ☕💖

item.title: Guide to the Fallen World
item.description:
Jeong Yeo-won wakes up from a frozen state.

When I opened my eyes, I found myself woke up 500 years later in a world that had already been destroyed.

A monster suddenly appears from the gate.
‘Esper’, a godlike creature who has awakened his powers follow its lead.

And the world is completely different from the past. Humans are no longer the masters of the Earth.

The Espers, who are supposed to hunt monsters and protect the city, are actually leading the world to further destruction due to their rampage. The ‘Guides’ that could calm the Espers have already disappeared.

But then.

“I’m a guide?”

The only guide who miraculously woke up in a discarded hibernation capsule.

Yeo-won creates a guiding drug that slows down the rampage and distributes it around the world.

Thus, the world is one step away from destruction,
but now she must protect herself from the espers who seek to find and possess the guide.

A drop of water that falls on dry land,

Will it be able to moisten the earth, or will it dry up and disappear in the heat.

item.title: The Young Male Protagonist Who is Destined for Ruin Fell for Me
The Young Male Protagonist Who is Destined for Ruin Fell for Me
If You Want To Frame Me As a Villainess, I Will Be The Villainess. However.
item.description: I, Christiane, am the fiancee of the Crown Prince of the Zebia Kingdom. However, at the party meant to celebrate my graduation from the academy, i find myself accused of wrongdoing by my fiance, Fabian. Beside him, clinging to him with a frightened look, is Baron Noelia. Lowering my head, trembling slightly, i lift my face to meet their gazes. To become the villainess.

The cold-blooded emperor whose face was stained with bl00d: “Nuan Nuan, for you, what does it matter if the empire falls?”

The demonized immortal with snow-white hair: “Nuan Nuan, you are my inner demon.”

The zombie king of the apocalypse with an unwavering gaze: “Nuan Nuan, it’s your choice—kill me, or save me.”

Sheng Nuan became even more panicked…

item.title: After Rebirth, I Married my Archenemy
item.description:
Before her death, Qun Qing hated the powerful official Lu Huating the most. She hated him for assisting the new emperor and for being cunning and insidious. She thought about him day and night, and tried her best to defeat him, but she was not his match. In the end, she became a cannon fodder in his hands.

After Qun Qing died, she saw the princess of the fallen country that she had protected with her life, crying and leaning on the new emperor’s chest: “Qung Qing is dead, what should I do?”
The new emperor kissed her: “You will be fine, just love me.”
The princess burst into tears, like a delicate flower under the rain: “Qung Qing is dead, Your Majesty is all I have left.”

When she opened his eyes, Qun Qing had woke up three years ago. She stood up, woodenly packed her bags, and regardless of the princess’s obstruction, took off her jade crown and walked away, dropped her female official’s wooden seal, turned around and left, leaving behind ten years of careful planning and treading on thin ice.

Restore the country? Pfft, restore it my foot.
——

The powerful minister Lu Huating is deeply cunning, ruthless, and dominates the power struggles of the court. Tired of the ugly nature of human hearts, his life has become dull and unfulfilling.

Looking back on his life, the only thing that left an impression was a female officer, a spy, whom he poisoned to death at the age of twenty-six.

For the love of the princess, she sacrificed his life for the country and schemed against him several times. In the end, she knelt in front of the Summer Palace, her facial expression remaining unchanged, with a look of resentment in her eyes, and sighed with a smile, “The king who wins is the ruler, and the one who loses is the defeated,” before raising her head and drinking to the last drop. Bl00d poured from her lips, a thin layer of vivid red.

When he opened his eyes again, Lu Huating returned to his twenty-three-year-old self.

Lu Huating looked at the documents under his command, and felt even more bored. He put down his brush and leaned on the back of the chair: “Where is the female official accompanying Crown Princess?”

“… She resigned. She asked me to tell My lord that she would not fight anymore.”

Lu Huating was silent for a while, and curled his lips coldly: “She said she won’t fight, so the fight is over?”

If you’re enjoying the story, please consider:

  1. Supporting the author
  2. Rating or leaving a review on NovelUpdates!

item.title: The Young Male Protagonist Who is Destined for Ruin Fell for Me
The Young Male Protagonist Who is Destined for Ruin Fell for Me
Guide to the Fallen World
item.description:
Jeong Yeo-won wakes up from a frozen state.

When I opened my eyes, I found myself woke up 500 years later in a world that had already been destroyed.

A monster suddenly appears from the gate.
‘Esper’, a godlike creature who has awakened his powers follow its lead.

And the world is completely different from the past. Humans are no longer the masters of the Earth.

The Espers, who are supposed to hunt monsters and protect the city, are actually leading the world to further destruction due to their rampage. The ‘Guides’ that could calm the Espers have already disappeared.

But then.

“I’m a guide?”

The only guide who miraculously woke up in a discarded hibernation capsule.

Yeo-won creates a guiding drug that slows down the rampage and distributes it around the world.

Thus, the world is one step away from destruction,
but now she must protect herself from the espers who seek to find and possess the guide.

A drop of water that falls on dry land,

Will it be able to moisten the earth, or will it dry up and disappear in the heat.

item.title: If You Want To Frame Me As a Villainess, I Will Be The Villainess. However.
item.description: I, Christiane, am the fiancee of the Crown Prince of the Zebia Kingdom. However, at the party meant to celebrate my graduation from the academy, i find myself accused of wrongdoing by my fiance, Fabian. Beside him, clinging to him with a frightened look, is Baron Noelia. Lowering my head, trembling slightly, i lift my face to meet their gazes. To become the villainess.

featuredImage.url: https://dragonholic.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/悪役令嬢に仕立て上げたいのならば、悪役令嬢になってあげましょう。ただし。.jpg

The demonized immortal with snow-white hair: “Nuan Nuan, you are my inner demon.”

The zombie king of the apocalypse with an unwavering gaze: “Nuan Nuan, it’s your choice—kill me, or save me.”

Sheng Nuan became even more panicked…

item.title: After Transmigrating, I Married the Male Lead’s Sister (GL)
item.description:
Synopsis:

Li Suimei knew that Qin Qing would disdain to attend her engagement ceremony with Qin Zhan.

After all, as a vicious female supporting character, Li Suimei’s role as a stepping stone for the male and female leads was almost over.

Why would Qin Qing come to help her?

Li Suimei chuckled bitterly. She had heard rumors about Qin Qing being very protective of her loved ones, but she didn’t know who had spread those rumors.

——At the engagement ceremony, Qin Qing, who was originally not supposed to attend, suddenly appeared. Wearing a snow-white wedding dress, she stood in the position that should have belonged to the male protagonist and said expressionlessly,

“Now, you are my wife.”

Li Suimei: “…”

Didn’t this person seem indifferent towards her just yesterday?

••••

Small Theater:

Qin Qing pinched Li Suimei’s wrist, her gaze fierce, “Back then, I always thought, you invited me to dinner and movies, stayed up late with me to go through documents, hugged my arm and cried, calling me ‘sister.’ Whenever I got angry, you would get nervous, and you even walked in and out of my room in your pajamas. If that wasn’t love, what was it?”

Li Suimei looked confused, “When did I bent?”

Qin Qing: “…”

Qin Qing pinched Li Suimei’s wrist, her gaze fierce, “Back then, I always thought, you invited me to dinner and movies, stayed up late with me to go through documents, hugged my arm and cried, calling me ‘sister.’ Whenever I got angry, you would get nervous, and you even walked in and out of my room in your pajamas. If that wasn’t love, what was it?”

Li Suimei looked confused, “When did I bent?”

Qin Qing: “…”

item.title: After Transmigrating, I Married the Male Lead’s Sister (GL)
item.description:
Synopsis:

Li Suimei knew that Qin Qing would disdain to attend her engagement ceremony with Qin Zhan.

After all, as a vicious female supporting character, Li Suimei’s role as a stepping stone for the male and female leads was almost over.

Why would Qin Qing come to help her?

Li Suimei chuckled bitterly. She had heard rumors about Qin Qing being very protective of her loved ones, but she didn’t know who had spread those rumors.

——At the engagement ceremony, Qin Qing, who was originally not supposed to attend, suddenly appeared. Wearing a snow-white wedding dress, she stood in the position that should have belonged to the male protagonist and said expressionlessly,

“Now, you are my wife.”

Li Suimei: “…”

Didn’t this person seem indifferent towards her just yesterday?

••••

Small Theater:

item.title: The Young Male Protagonist Who is Destined for Ruin Fell for Me
The Young Male Protagonist Who is Destined for Ruin Fell for Me
The Young Male Protagonist Who is Destined for Ruin Fell for Me
If You Want To Frame Me As a Villainess, I Will Be The Villainess. However.
item.description: I, Christiane, am the fiancee of the Crown Prince of the Zebia Kingdom. However, at the party meant to celebrate my graduation from the academy, i find myself accused of wrongdoing by my fiance, Fabian. Beside him, clinging to him with a frightened look, is Baron Noelia. Lowering my head, trembling slightly, i lift my face to meet their gazes. To become the villainess.

featuredImage.url: https://dragonholic.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/悪役令嬢に仕立て上げたいのならば、悪役令嬢になってあげましょう。ただし。.jpg

item.title: Quick Transmigration: The Villain Is Too Pampered and Alluring
item.description:
To survive, Sheng Nuan must traverse different worlds, playing the role of self-destructive cannon fodder while saving the darkest villains. These villains are cold-blooded, obsessive, and ruthless—capable of annihilating millions with a smile and destroying the world with a wave of their hand. Holding the cannon fodder’s script, Sheng Nuan is terrified…

Later:

A paranoid young man with a gloomy expression: “Nuan Nuan, you’re not allowed to go anywhere except by my side…”

The cold-blooded emperor whose face was stained with bl00d: “Nuan Nuan, for you, what does it matter if the empire falls?”

The demonized immortal with snow-white hair: “Nuan Nuan, you are my inner demon.”

The zombie king of the apocalypse with an unwavering gaze: “Nuan Nuan, it’s your choice—kill me, or save me.”

Sheng Nuan became even more panicked…

If you’re enjoying the story, please consider:

  1. Supporting the author
  2. Rating or leaving a review on NovelUpdates!

item.title: Rebirth of the Excellent Daughter of the Marquis Household (REDMH)
item.description:
Gu Yu Qi, a daughter born to a marquis household. She was beautiful with knowledge in both civil and military, and her kindness broader than the sky. It was love at first sight for her, and she insisted on marrying him and was happy even if she were to become a mistress. She worked hard to help him step by step to become the emperor.

But what happened to her in the end?

For ten whole years, she was humiliated and abandoned. Disheartened, she drank poison to end her life and set her place on fire, only to find herself back to when she was ten years old. It was the year she followed her mother into the capital. It wasn’t too late to change her fate.

If Yun Ke had any regrets in his previous life, then it would be how he always kept thinking about a woman who died decades ago. Because of that, before he died, he secretly had the woman’s ashes pressed beneath his coffin. As the emperor, he had the final say of everything under the sky. So how could he allow that woman to be arrogant in front of him? Even at his deathbed, he would crush her beneath him.

Who knew he’d be reborn again…

When the transmigrated girl meets the boy who was reborn, Gu Yu Qi simply wanted to yell at the sky. Just what are you playing at!?

item.title: The Young Male Protagonist Who is Destined for Ruin Fell for Me
The Young Male Protagonist Who is Destined for Ruin Fell for Me
The Young Marquis Regrets Too Late
item.description:
Jiang Jingchun, who was the cherished daughter of a minister’s household, grew up as a true pampered young miss. She could have whatever she desired, except for one thing: her cousin, Gu Huaisheng, the young marquis of a marquis’ residence.

Gu Huaisheng, who was the son of a marquis’ household, was like snow on the eaves or the moon outside the window—elegant, untouchable, and the most outstanding young man in his family. He was far beyond anyone’s reach.

Jiang Jingchun tried everything to win his favour. She found out the type of person he seemed to admire and transformed herself from an outspoken and willful young lady into someone obedient and meek in his presence.

Yet no matter how hard she tried, Gu Huaisheng would barely spare her a glance.

The frustrated and desperate Jiang Jingchun followed a terrible idea from her closest friend. One day, while he wasn’t paying attention, she leaned in to kiss his cheek. But just as she moved closer, Gu Huaisheng turned his head, and their lips accidentally met…

The soft touch of their lips startled her, but before Jiang Jingchun could even blush, Gu Huaisheng shoved her away harshly. With a cold and angry glare, he spat, “Shameless,” and strode away without a backward glance.

That one push left Jiang Jingchun completely stunned and shattered her girlish infatuation into pieces.

Misfortunes never come singly. On the same day, news arrived at the minister’s household: the true daughter of their family had been found.

Jiang Jingchun had lived as the family’s treasured daughter for over a decade. Only then did she learn that she was, in fact, a fake daughter.

At the true daughter’s formal recognition banquet, Jiang Jingchun witnessed something that cut deeper than anything before. Gu Huaisheng, who had always been cold and distant to her, now stood before the true daughter and treated her gently and warmly.

He could smile, she realised, but not for her.

From beginning to end, she had been nothing but a colossal joke.

Gu Huaisheng was cruel. She swore she would never like him again.

After the true daughter of the Jiang family returned, Jiang Jingchun’s heart turned to ashes. She calmly accepted the marriage that the Jiang family arranged for her.

But before the betrothal was finalised, Gu Huaisheng appeared at her family residence’s doorstep.

On a day of heavy rain, he stood in the downpour under an umbrella, gripping her delicate wrist and refusing to let go. He said, “He is not a good man.”

Jiang Jingchun laughed and shook off his hand. “He is still far kinder than you, Cousin.”

Under Jiang Jingchun’s icy gaze, Gu Huaisheng tensed up. A sharp ache spread through his chest.

For the first time, the proud and aloof young marquis understood what it truly meant to feel regret.

item.title: Quick Transmigration: The Villain Is Too Pampered and Alluring
item.description:
To survive, Sheng Nuan must traverse different worlds, playing the role of self-destructive cannon fodder while saving the darkest villains. These villains are cold-blooded, obsessive, and ruthless—capable of annihilating millions with a smile and destroying the world with a wave of their hand. Holding the cannon fodder’s script, Sheng Nuan is terrified…

Later:

A paranoid young man with a gloomy expression: “Nuan Nuan, you’re not allowed to go anywhere except by my side…”

The cold-blooded emperor whose face was stained with bl00d: “Nuan Nuan, for you, what does it matter if the empire falls?”

The demonized immortal with snow-white hair: “Nuan Nuan, you are my inner demon.”

The zombie king of the apocalypse with an unwavering gaze: “Nuan Nuan, it’s your choice—kill me, or save me.”

Sheng Nuan became even more panicked…

If you’re enjoying the story, please consider:

  1. Supporting the author
  2. Rating or leaving a review on NovelUpdates!

If you spot any mistakes in my translation, feel free to DM me on Discord (cannibalturtle) or report it in the Dragonholic Discord server. Join the server and get your role to get the fastest and most recent chapter release notifications and announcements.

Release schedule: Advance chapters will be updated daily at 8 PM (UTC+8).

If you love what I do, you can buy me coffee on ko-fi to show your support.

item.title: After Transmigrating, I Married the Male Lead’s Sister (GL)
item.description:
Synopsis:

Li Suimei knew that Qin Qing would disdain to attend her engagement ceremony with Qin Zhan.

After all, as a vicious female supporting character, Li Suimei’s role as a stepping stone for the male and female leads was almost over.

Why would Qin Qing come to help her?

Li Suimei chuckled bitterly. She had heard rumors about Qin Qing being very protective of her loved ones, but she didn’t know who had spread those rumors.

——At the engagement ceremony, Qin Qing, who was originally not supposed to attend, suddenly appeared. Wearing a snow-white wedding dress, she stood in the position that should have belonged to the male protagonist and said expressionlessly,

“Now, you are my wife.”

Li Suimei: “…”

Didn’t this person seem indifferent towards her just yesterday?

••••

Small Theater:

Qin Qing pinched Li Suimei’s wrist, her gaze fierce, “Back then, I always thought, you invited me to dinner and movies, stayed up late with me to go through documents, hugged my arm and cried, calling me ‘sister.’ Whenever I got angry, you would get nervous, and you even walked in and out of my room in your pajamas. If that wasn’t love, what was it?”

Li Suimei looked confused, “When did I bent?”

Qin Qing: “…”

The soft touch of their lips startled her, but before Jiang Jingchun could even blush, Gu Huaisheng shoved her away harshly. With a cold and angry glare, he spat, “Shameless,” and strode away without a backward glance.

That one push left Jiang Jingchun completely stunned and shattered her girlish infatuation into pieces.

Misfortunes never come singly. On the same day, news arrived at the minister’s household: the true daughter of their family had been found.

Jiang Jingchun had lived as the family’s treasured daughter for over a decade. Only then did she learn that she was, in fact, a fake daughter.

At the true daughter’s formal recognition banquet, Jiang Jingchun witnessed something that cut deeper than anything before. Gu Huaisheng, who had always been cold and distant to her, now stood before the true daughter and treated her gently and warmly.

He could smile, she realised, but not for her.

From beginning to end, she had been nothing but a colossal joke.

Gu Huaisheng was cruel. She swore she would never like him again.

After the true daughter of the Jiang family returned, Jiang Jingchun’s heart turned to ashes. She calmly accepted the marriage that the Jiang family arranged for her.

But before the betrothal was finalised, Gu Huaisheng appeared at her family residence’s doorstep.

On a day of heavy rain, he stood in the downpour under an umbrella, gripping her delicate wrist and refusing to let go. He said, “He is not a good man.”

Jiang Jingchun laughed and shook off his hand. “He is still far kinder than you, Cousin.”

Under Jiang Jingchun’s icy gaze, Gu Huaisheng tensed up. A sharp ache spread through his chest.

For the first time, the proud and aloof young marquis understood what it truly meant to feel regret.

item.title: If You Want To Frame Me As a Villainess, I Will Be The Villainess. However.
item.description: I, Christiane, am the fiancee of the Crown Prince of the Zebia Kingdom. However, at the party meant to celebrate my graduation from the academy, i find myself accused of wrongdoing by my fiance, Fabian. Beside him, clinging to him with a frightened look, is Baron Noelia. Lowering my head, trembling slightly, i lift my face to meet their gazes. To become the villainess.

featuredImage.url: https://dragonholic.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/悪役令嬢に仕立て上げたいのならば、悪役令嬢になってあげましょう。ただし。.jpg

item.title: Quick Transmigration: The Villain Is Too Pampered and Alluring
item.description:
To survive, Sheng Nuan must traverse different worlds, playing the role of self-destructive cannon fodder while saving the darkest villains. These villains are cold-blooded, obsessive, and ruthless—capable of annihilating millions with a smile and destroying the world with a wave of their hand. Holding the cannon fodder’s script, Sheng Nuan is terrified…

Later:

A paranoid young man with a gloomy expression: “Nuan Nuan, you’re not allowed to go anywhere except by my side…”

The cold-blooded emperor whose face was stained with bl00d: “Nuan Nuan, for you, what does it matter if the empire falls?”

The demonized immortal with snow-white hair: “Nuan Nuan, you are my inner demon.”

The zombie king of the apocalypse with an unwavering gaze: “Nuan Nuan, it’s your choice—kill me, or save me.”

Sheng Nuan became even more panicked…
