item.title: Red Dot
item.description:
“Every day, a recurring hellish dream. Junseong is stuck in a world that feels like an endless loop, much like a roguelike game. It’s a cursed world where he struggles every day. Two months have passed since he set foot in the zombie apocalypse world in his dreams. “Ha….” As soon as he woke up, his gaze was instinctively drawn to the internet broadcast that he habitually left on. -A major riot is occurring in some regions due to the current situation… Then, beep! A loud sound announcing a disaster alert echoed in Junseong’s head. Unconsciously picking up his phone along with the alarm sound, Junseong couldn’t hide his confused expression.
[10:44 AM] It was the exact time he had always woken up in his dream. Everything was just like his usual dreams. However, a man he had never seen in his dreams before, Do Hanseo, appeared right in front of Junseong. “I’ve been wanting to ask you something.”
“What?” As Junseong was about to reply, he felt a change in Hanseo’s gaze. The smile that had been on his lips disappeared. Consequently, Junseong felt a strong, cold, and sharp pressure, as if a dagger was piercing his throat. “Why do you look at me like that?” Feeling the strange pressure, Junseong, who had tightly sealed his lips for a moment, asked instead. “How am I… looking at you?”
“….” Instead of an immediate answer, Hanseo just gazed silently. Then, he showed the ‘fake smile’ he had been holding onto a little while ago. His clothes were too clean, his body had no wounds, and the smell of bl00d was so strong in comparison. When he took off his clothes, he could be sure. The scent of bl00d from the man named Do Hanseo was not from his ‘clothes’ but emanated from him.“

Holding the cannon fodder’s script, Sheng Nuan is terrified…

Later:

A paranoid young man with a gloomy expression: “Nuan Nuan, you’re not allowed to go anywhere except by my side…”

The cold-blooded emperor whose face was stained with bl00d: “Nuan Nuan, for you, what does it matter if the empire falls?”

The demonized immortal with snow-white hair: “Nuan Nuan, you are my inner demon.”

The zombie king of the apocalypse with an unwavering gaze: “Nuan Nuan, it’s your choice—kill me, or save me.”

Sheng Nuan became even more panicked…

item.title: Guide to the Fallen World
item.description:
Jeong Yeo-won wakes up from a frozen state.

When I opened my eyes, I found myself woke up 500 years later in a world that had already been destroyed.

A monster suddenly appears from the gate.
‘Esper’, a godlike creature who has awakened his powers follow its lead.

And the world is completely different from the past. Humans are no longer the masters of the Earth.

The Espers, who are supposed to hunt monsters and protect the city, are actually leading the world to further destruction due to their rampage. The ‘Guides’ that could calm the Espers have already disappeared.

But then.

“I’m a guide?”

The only guide who miraculously woke up in a discarded hibernation capsule.

Yeo-won creates a guiding drug that slows down the rampage and distributes it around the world.

Thus, the world is one step away from destruction,
but now she must protect herself from the espers who seek to find and possess the guide.

A drop of water that falls on dry land,

Will it be able to moisten the earth, or will it dry up and disappear in the heat.

item.title: Bondage and Marriage
item.description:
Noah, a masochist who enjoys pain. One day, due to his father’s arbitrary decision, he is forced into an arranged political marriage with a man named Ian Miller…

“…Ah, I got it right this time? Yeah, I’ll use this for my fiancé. What of it?” Ian’s voice continued soothingly. “Even if I just torment him a little, that young master will run off crying to his daddy. If he’s an alpha, he might even be traumatized.”

In this world, is this a dream or reality? Is my fiancé now buying adult toys from my favorite club just to torment me? That sounded far more alluring and sweet than any love confession Noah had ever heard. Noah immediately changed the resolve he had just made to not marry Ian Miller. Someone who would even pluck a star from the sky for him is nothing special, and someone who hates him is nothing special either, but someone who will torment him is most welcome. This marriage must happen! It absolutely must! The delusion and love between a lovable, cute masochist and a lone, serious bad guy!

item.title: Double Junk
item.description:
“I’ll pay a high price,” said Seokju, the boss of the Taeho faction, to the crippled gang member Ajin, marking the beginning of their relationship born out of a misunderstanding one night. “Like you have a leg disease. I have insomnia. Shall we help each other as patients?”
Using Seokju’s insomnia as an excuse, Ajin fell asleep in his embrace, becoming accustomed to his body temperature. “I want to work at your place until I die.” “Then just stay here. Here, in my room, sit on my knees. Let me bring the world to this room. But doubts keep sprouting, despite sealing the cracks of happiness.”
“Ajin, you can’t leave this room until you’ve paid off all your debts.” Now, this room became Ajin’s world, yet he found solace in the fact that Seokju didn’t abandon him.

item.title: Reasonable Loss
item.description:
*This story contains themes of coercive relationships and uncomfortable subjects.

A child was on the way.
We loved each other, were happy together, and dreamed of a future as a family.
But on the way to the obstetrician to meet the baby, an unexpected accident occurred.
Due to the accident, Dokwon didn’t open his eyes for a long time, and when he finally came to…
“Omega?”
He didn’t remember me.

But I was okay. We loved each other more than anything. I believed without a doubt that we could return to that time.
Dokwon’s words hurt, but I could endure it. I could bear it.
“You’ll regret this.”
“Me? What will I regret?”
“Talking to me like that.”
“What?”
“Treating me poorly. Treating me like a gold digger. Seeing me as an empty-headed omega who only emits pheromones. You’ll regret it later.”

But the world relentlessly pushed us to the edge.
And finally,
“Let’s end this here.”
“…What?”
“Get rid of the baby.”
“…What did you say?”
“Let’s end this without causing any more disgrace. Eunsoo Yoo.”
The end tore us apart.

Left standing alone at the end… I fervently wished for death.

item.title: Red Dot
item.description:
“Every day, a recurring hellish dream. Junseong is stuck in a world that feels like an endless loop, much like a roguelike game. It’s a cursed world where he struggles every day. Two months have passed since he set foot in the zombie apocalypse world in his dreams. “Ha….” As soon as he woke up, his gaze was instinctively drawn to the internet broadcast that he habitually left on. -A major riot is occurring in some regions due to the current situation… Then, beep! A loud sound announcing a disaster alert echoed in Junseong’s head. Unconsciously picking up his phone along with the alarm sound, Junseong couldn’t hide his confused expression.
[10:44 AM] It was the exact time he had always woken up in his dream. Everything was just like his usual dreams. However, a man he had never seen in his dreams before, Do Hanseo, appeared right in front of Junseong. “I’ve been wanting to ask you something.”
“What?” As Junseong was about to reply, he felt a change in Hanseo’s gaze. The smile that had been on his lips disappeared. Consequently, Junseong felt a strong, cold, and sharp pressure, as if a dagger was piercing his throat. “Why do you look at me like that?” Feeling the strange pressure, Junseong, who had tightly sealed his lips for a moment, asked instead. “How am I… looking at you?”
“….” Instead of an immediate answer, Hanseo just gazed silently. Then, he showed the ‘fake smile’ he had been holding onto a little while ago. His clothes were too clean, his body had no wounds, and the smell of bl00d was so strong in comparison. When he took off his clothes, he could be sure. The scent of bl00d from the man named Do Hanseo was not from his ‘clothes’ but emanated from him.“

item.title: If You Want To Frame Me As a Villainess, I Will Be The Villainess. However.
item.description: I, Christiane, am the fiancee of the Crown Prince of the Zebia Kingdom. However, at the party meant to celebrate my graduation from the academy, i find myself accused of wrongdoing by my fiance, Fabian. Beside him, clinging to him with a frightened look, is Baron Noelia. Lowering my head, trembling slightly, i lift my face to meet their gazes. To become the villainess.

Holding the cannon fodder’s script, Sheng Nuan is terrified…

Later:

A paranoid young man with a gloomy expression: “Nuan Nuan, you’re not allowed to go anywhere except by my side…”

The cold-blooded emperor whose face was stained with bl00d: “Nuan Nuan, for you, what does it matter if the empire falls?”

The demonized immortal with snow-white hair: “Nuan Nuan, you are my inner demon.”

The zombie king of the apocalypse with an unwavering gaze: “Nuan Nuan, it’s your choice—kill me, or save me.”

Sheng Nuan became even more panicked…

item.title: Clap
item.description:
Jaemin went for an interview after hearing about a cleaning part-time job at the dentist’s office. The doctor he met there, Lee Hyun, was extremely neat.

“Are you an omega?”

Why is he asking if I’m an omega?

Jaemin, who is not good at his job and lacks awareness, but is kind, becomes a cleaner on the day of the interview. The next day when Jaemin goes to the dentist’s office, he stutters at the cold tone of Lee Hyun, which is different from yesterday.

“I’m a cleaner… part-time job. Temporary work. Three hours a day, twenty thousand won per hour.”

“I told you this morning. The newly hired cleaning part-timer is so cute.”

“Oh. Cleaning.”

The only difference in appearance is the presence or absence of glasses between the twin brothers Ihyun and Ichan. Jaemin, unaware that he has fallen into their trap, works diligently, but soon realizes that something is wrong.

“I want to go home. Please let me go.”

#OmegaBus #Obsession #LightBus #Dominance #Escape #OneTwoThree #HighRank

item.title: Double Junk
item.description:
“I’ll pay a high price,” said Seokju, the boss of the Taeho faction, to the crippled gang member Ajin, marking the beginning of their relationship born out of a misunderstanding one night. “Like you have a leg disease. I have insomnia. Shall we help each other as patients?”
Using Seokju’s insomnia as an excuse, Ajin fell asleep in his embrace, becoming accustomed to his body temperature. “I want to work at your place until I die.” “Then just stay here. Here, in my room, sit on my knees. Let me bring the world to this room. But doubts keep sprouting, despite sealing the cracks of happiness.”
“Ajin, you can’t leave this room until you’ve paid off all your debts.” Now, this room became Ajin’s world, yet he found solace in the fact that Seokju didn’t abandon him.

item.title: Bondage and Marriage
item.description:
Noah, a masochist who enjoys pain. One day, due to his father’s arbitrary decision, he is forced into an arranged political marriage with a man named Ian Miller…

“…Ah, I got it right this time? Yeah, I’ll use this for my fiancé. What of it?” Ian’s voice continued soothingly. “Even if I just torment him a little, that young master will run off crying to his daddy. If he’s an alpha, he might even be traumatized.”

In this world, is this a dream or reality? Is my fiancé now buying adult toys from my favorite club just to torment me? That sounded far more alluring and sweet than any love confession Noah had ever heard. Noah immediately changed the resolve he had just made to not marry Ian Miller. Someone who would even pluck a star from the sky for him is nothing special, and someone who hates him is nothing special either, but someone who will torment him is most welcome. This marriage must happen! It absolutely must! The delusion and love between a lovable, cute masochist and a lone, serious bad guy!

Someone who would even pluck a star from the sky for him is nothing special, and someone who hates him is nothing special either, but someone who will torment him is most welcome. This marriage must happen! It absolutely must! The delusion and love between a lovable, cute masochist and a lone, serious bad guy!

item.title: Bondage and Marriage
item.description:
Noah, a masochist who enjoys pain. One day, due to his father’s arbitrary decision, he is forced into an arranged political marriage with a man named Ian Miller…

“…Ah, I got it right this time? Yeah, I’ll use this for my fiancé. What of it?” Ian’s voice continued soothingly. “Even if I just torment him a little, that young master will run off crying to his daddy. If he’s an alpha, he might even be traumatized.”

In this world, is this a dream or reality? Is my fiancé now buying adult toys from my favorite club just to torment me? item.title: Clap
item.description:
Jaemin went for an interview after hearing about a cleaning part-time job at the dentist’s office. The doctor he met there, Lee Hyun, was extremely neat.

“Are you an omega?”

Why is he asking if I’m an omega?

Jaemin, who is not good at his job and lacks awareness, but is kind, becomes a cleaner on the day of the interview. The next day when Jaemin goes to the dentist’s office, he stutters at the cold tone of Lee Hyun, which is different from yesterday.

“I’m a cleaner… part-time job. Temporary work. Three hours a day, twenty thousand won per hour.”

“I told you this morning. The newly hired cleaning part-timer is so cute.”

“Oh. Cleaning.”

The only difference in appearance is the presence or absence of glasses between the twin brothers Ihyun and Ichan. Jaemin, unaware that he has fallen into their trap, works diligently, but soon realizes that something is wrong.

“I want to go home. Please let me go.”

#OmegaBus #Obsession #LightBus #Dominance #Escape #OneTwoThree #HighRank

item.title: Double Junk
item.description:
“I’ll pay a high price,” said Seokju, the boss of the Taeho faction, to the crippled gang member Ajin, marking the beginning of their relationship born out of a misunderstanding one night. “Like you have a leg disease. I have insomnia. Shall we help each other as patients?”
Using Seokju’s insomnia as an excuse, Ajin fell asleep in his embrace, becoming accustomed to his body temperature. “I want to work at your place until I die.” “Then just stay here. Here, in my room, sit on my knees. Let me bring the world to this room. But doubts keep sprouting, despite sealing the cracks of happiness.”
“Ajin, you can’t leave this room until you’ve paid off all your debts.” Now, this room became Ajin’s world, yet he found solace in the fact that Seokju didn’t abandon him.

item.title: Quick Transmigration: The Villain Is Too Pampered and Alluring
item.nameextend: ***I Inflict a Love Tribulation on the Demon God 012***
item.description:
To survive, Sheng Nuan must traverse different worlds, playing the role of self-destructive cannon fodder while saving the darkest villains. These villains are cold-blooded, obsessive, and ruthless—capable of annihilating millions with a smile and destroying the world with a wave of their hand. Holding the cannon fodder’s script, Sheng Nuan is terrified…

Later:

A paranoid young man with a gloomy expression: “Nuan Nuan, you’re not allowed to go anywhere except by my side…”

The cold-blooded emperor whose face was stained with bl00d: “Nuan Nuan, for you, what does it matter if the empire falls?”

The demonized immortal with snow-white hair: “Nuan Nuan, you are my inner demon.”

The zombie king of the apocalypse with an unwavering gaze: “Nuan Nuan, it’s your choice—kill me, or save me.”

Sheng Nuan became even more panicked…

If you’re enjoying the story, please consider:

  1. Supporting the author
  2. Rating or leaving a review on NovelUpdates!

If you spot any mistakes in my translation, feel free to DM me on Discord (cannibalturtle) or report it in the Dragonholic Discord server. Join the server and get your role to get the fastest and most recent chapter release notifications and announcements.

This marriage must happen! It absolutely must! The delusion and love between a lovable, cute masochist and a lone, serious bad guy!

item.title: Bondage and Marriage
item.description:
Noah, a masochist who enjoys pain. One day, due to his father’s arbitrary decision, he is forced into an arranged political marriage with a man named Ian Miller…

“…Ah, I got it right this time? Yeah, I’ll use this for my fiancé. What of it?” Ian’s voice continued soothingly. “Even if I just torment him a little, that young master will run off crying to his daddy. If he’s an alpha, he might even be traumatized.”

In this world, is this a dream or reality? Is my fiancé now buying adult toys from my favorite club just to torment me? That sounded far more alluring and sweet than any love confession Noah had ever heard. Noah immediately changed the resolve he had just made to not marry Ian Miller. Someone who would even pluck a star from the sky for him is nothing special, and someone who hates him is nothing special either, but someone who will torment him is most welcome. item.title: Quick Transmigration: The Villain Is Too Pampered and Alluring
item.nameextend: ***I Inflict a Love Tribulation on the Demon God 003***
item.description:
To survive, Sheng Nuan must traverse different worlds, playing the role of self-destructive cannon fodder while saving the darkest villains. These villains are cold-blooded, obsessive, and ruthless—capable of annihilating millions with a smile and destroying the world with a wave of their hand. Holding the cannon fodder’s script, Sheng Nuan is terrified…

Later:

A paranoid young man with a gloomy expression: “Nuan Nuan, you’re not allowed to go anywhere except by my side…”

The cold-blooded emperor whose face was stained with bl00d: “Nuan Nuan, for you, what does it matter if the empire falls?”

The demonized immortal with snow-white hair: “Nuan Nuan, you are my inner demon.”

The zombie king of the apocalypse with an unwavering gaze: “Nuan Nuan, it’s your choice—kill me, or save me.”

Sheng Nuan became even more panicked…

If you’re enjoying the story, please consider:

  1. Supporting the author
  2. Rating or leaving a review on NovelUpdates!

If you spot any mistakes in my translation, feel free to DM me on Discord (cannibalturtle) or report it in the Dragonholic Discord server. Join the server and get your role to get the fastest and most recent chapter release notifications and announcements.

item.title: The Young Male Protagonist Who is Destined for Ruin Fell for Me
The Young Male Protagonist Who is Destined for Ruin Fell for Me
Guide to the Fallen World
item.description:
Jeong Yeo-won wakes up from a frozen state.

When I opened my eyes, I found myself woke up 500 years later in a world that had already been destroyed.

A monster suddenly appears from the gate.
‘Esper’, a godlike creature who has awakened his powers follow its lead.

And the world is completely different from the past. Humans are no longer the masters of the Earth.

The Espers, who are supposed to hunt monsters and protect the city, are actually leading the world to further destruction due to their rampage. The ‘Guides’ that could calm the Espers have already disappeared.

But then.

“I’m a guide?”

The only guide who miraculously woke up in a discarded hibernation capsule.

Yeo-won creates a guiding drug that slows down the rampage and distributes it around the world.

Thus, the world is one step away from destruction,
but now she must protect herself from the espers who seek to find and possess the guide.

A drop of water that falls on dry land,

Will it be able to moisten the earth, or will it dry up and disappear in the heat.

Holding the cannon fodder’s script, Sheng Nuan is terrified…

Later:

A paranoid young man with a gloomy expression: “Nuan Nuan, you’re not allowed to go anywhere except by my side…”

The cold-blooded emperor whose face was stained with bl00d: “Nuan Nuan, for you, what does it matter if the empire falls?”

The demonized immortal with snow-white hair: “Nuan Nuan, you are my inner demon.”

The zombie king of the apocalypse with an unwavering gaze: “Nuan Nuan, it’s your choice—kill me, or save me.”

Sheng Nuan became even more panicked…

If you’re enjoying the story, please consider:

  1. Supporting the author
  2. Rating or leaving a review on NovelUpdates!

item.title: Guide to the Fallen World
item.description:
Jeong Yeo-won wakes up from a frozen state.

When I opened my eyes, I found myself woke up 500 years later in a world that had already been destroyed.

A monster suddenly appears from the gate.
‘Esper’, a godlike creature who has awakened his powers follow its lead.

And the world is completely different from the past. Humans are no longer the masters of the Earth.

The Espers, who are supposed to hunt monsters and protect the city, are actually leading the world to further destruction due to their rampage. The ‘Guides’ that could calm the Espers have already disappeared.

But then.

“I’m a guide?”

The only guide who miraculously woke up in a discarded hibernation capsule.

Yeo-won creates a guiding drug that slows down the rampage and distributes it around the world.

Thus, the world is one step away from destruction,
but now she must protect herself from the espers who seek to find and possess the guide.

A drop of water that falls on dry land,

Will it be able to moisten the earth, or will it dry up and disappear in the heat.

Guide to the Fallen World

item.title: After Retirement, Living a Stud Life in Another World
item.description: After drinking too much at my retirement celebration, I woke up to find myself inexplicably transformed into a beautiful young boy in another world. In this world where magic reigns supreme, there’s a catch – only women can use magic. The value of men lies in their ability to produce magically powerful offspring, recognized only through the demanding role of a ‘stud’ in a challenging setting. Somehow, when I engage in procreation, both the children and their mothers gain peculiar powers. Before I knew it, my surroundings were filled with women. Is this some kind of cheat?

item.title: Double Junk
item.description:
“I’ll pay a high price,” said Seokju, the boss of the Taeho faction, to the crippled gang member Ajin, marking the beginning of their relationship born out of a misunderstanding one night. “Like you have a leg disease. I have insomnia. Shall we help each other as patients?”
Using Seokju’s insomnia as an excuse, Ajin fell asleep in his embrace, becoming accustomed to his body temperature. “I want to work at your place until I die.” “Then just stay here. Here, in my room, sit on my knees. Let me bring the world to this room. But doubts keep sprouting, despite sealing the cracks of happiness.”
“Ajin, you can’t leave this room until you’ve paid off all your debts.” Now, this room became Ajin’s world, yet he found solace in the fact that Seokju didn’t abandon him.

item.title: My Bloody Valentine
item.description:
※ This work contains immoral subject matter, violent acts, and descriptions of coercive relationships, among other things. Additionally, the settings, backgrounds, and characters in the work are all fictional. Please keep this in mind while enjoying the story.

Han’s simple daily life working part-time at a convenience store is suddenly turned upside down.

“Your debt amounts to a total of one hundred million and seven thousand.”

With a timid and fearful personality, Han is unwittingly drawn into the world of the ‘Tasenda’ club to repay the massive debt he incurred. There, he meets Jang Taesin, a man who is a perfect fit for the depths of darkness.

From the moment Taesin laid eyes on Han, he was inexplicably drawn to him and began to obsessively pursue him, offering a proposal to keep him from escaping.

“I’ll stay by your side only until I get tired of you. Once I’m tired of your body, I’ll consider your debt paid and let you go.”
“How long will it take for you to get tired of me?”
“About twenty times, and I won’t get tired.”

However, instead of getting tired, the thirst only grew stronger.

He wanted to see, touch, and possess him. Once he had his body, he found himself desiring his heart as well.

“Why don’t I ever get to see that cheap smile of yours?”
“You’ll never see me smile in front of you, even if I die.”

Taesin couldn’t understand why Han hated him so much, and Han couldn’t fathom Taesin’s obsession with him.

Thus, the tangled threads of a complex relationship began to weave between the two, as distant from the end of the world as they could be. Can these two people, who seem so far apart from the rest of the world, really be together?

He wanted to see, touch, and possess him. Once he had his body, he found himself desiring his heart as well.

“Why don’t I ever get to see that cheap smile of yours?”
“You’ll never see me smile in front of you, even if I die.”

Taesin couldn’t understand why Han hated him so much, and Han couldn’t fathom Taesin’s obsession with him.

Thus, the tangled threads of a complex relationship began to weave between the two, as distant from the end of the world as they could be. Can these two people, who seem so far apart from the rest of the world, really be together?

item.title: My Bloody Valentine
item.description:
※ This work contains immoral subject matter, violent acts, and descriptions of coercive relationships, among other things. Additionally, the settings, backgrounds, and characters in the work are all fictional. Please keep this in mind while enjoying the story.

Han’s simple daily life working part-time at a convenience store is suddenly turned upside down.

“Your debt amounts to a total of one hundred million and seven thousand.”

With a timid and fearful personality, Han is unwittingly drawn into the world of the ‘Tasenda’ club to repay the massive debt he incurred. There, he meets Jang Taesin, a man who is a perfect fit for the depths of darkness.

item.title: Quick Transmigration: The Villain Is Too Pampered and Alluring
item.description:
To survive, Sheng Nuan must traverse different worlds, playing the role of self-destructive cannon fodder while saving the darkest villains. These villains are cold-blooded, obsessive, and ruthless—capable of annihilating millions with a smile and destroying the world with a wave of their hand. Holding the cannon fodder’s script, Sheng Nuan is terrified…

Later:

A paranoid young man with a gloomy expression: “Nuan Nuan, you’re not allowed to go anywhere except by my side…”

The cold-blooded emperor whose face was stained with bl00d: “Nuan Nuan, for you, what does it matter if the empire falls?”

The demonized immortal with snow-white hair: “Nuan Nuan, you are my inner demon.”

The zombie king of the apocalypse with an unwavering gaze: “Nuan Nuan, it’s your choice—kill me, or save me.”

Sheng Nuan became even more panicked…

If you’re enjoying the story, please consider:

  1. Supporting the author
  2. Rating or leaving a review on NovelUpdates!

If you spot any mistakes in my translation, feel free to DM me on Discord (cannibalturtle) or report it in the Dragonholic Discord server. Join the server and get your role to get the fastest and most recent chapter release notifications and announcements.

Release schedule: Advance chapters will be updated daily at 8 PM (UTC+8).

If you love what I do, you can buy me coffee on ko-fi to show your support.

item.title: Guide to the Fallen World
item.description:
Jeong Yeo-won wakes up from a frozen state.

When I opened my eyes, I found myself woke up 500 years later in a world that had already been destroyed.

A monster suddenly appears from the gate.
‘Esper’, a godlike creature who has awakened his powers follow its lead.

And the world is completely different from the past. Humans are no longer the masters of the Earth.

The Espers, who are supposed to hunt monsters and protect the city, are actually leading the world to further destruction due to their rampage. The ‘Guides’ that could calm the Espers have already disappeared.

But then.

“I’m a guide?”

The only guide who miraculously woke up in a discarded hibernation capsule.

Yeo-won creates a guiding drug that slows down the rampage and distributes it around the world.

Thus, the world is one step away from destruction,
but now she must protect herself from the espers who seek to find and possess the guide.

A drop of water that falls on dry land,

Will it be able to moisten the earth, or will it dry up and disappear in the heat.

item.title: After Retirement, Living a Stud Life in Another World
item.description: After drinking too much at my retirement celebration, I woke up to find myself inexplicably transformed into a beautiful young boy in another world. In this world where magic reigns supreme, there’s a catch – only women can use magic. The value of men lies in their ability to produce magically powerful offspring, recognized only through the demanding role of a ‘stud’ in a challenging setting. Somehow, when I engage in procreation, both the children and their mothers gain peculiar powers. Before I knew it, my surroundings were filled with women. Is this some kind of cheat?

The zombie king of the apocalypse with an unwavering gaze: “Nuan Nuan, it’s your choice—kill me, or save me.”

Sheng Nuan became even more panicked…

item.title: My Bloody Valentine
item.description:
※ This work contains immoral subject matter, violent acts, and descriptions of coercive relationships, among other things. Additionally, the settings, backgrounds, and characters in the work are all fictional. Please keep this in mind while enjoying the story.

Han’s simple daily life working part-time at a convenience store is suddenly turned upside down.

“Your debt amounts to a total of one hundred million and seven thousand.”

With a timid and fearful personality, Han is unwittingly drawn into the world of the ‘Tasenda’ club to repay the massive debt he incurred. There, he meets Jang Taesin, a man who is a perfect fit for the depths of darkness.

From the moment Taesin laid eyes on Han, he was inexplicably drawn to him and began to obsessively pursue him, offering a proposal to keep him from escaping.

“I’ll stay by your side only until I get tired of you. Once I’m tired of your body, I’ll consider your debt paid and let you go.”
“How long will it take for you to get tired of me?”
“About twenty times, and I won’t get tired.”

However, instead of getting tired, the thirst only grew stronger.

He wanted to see, touch, and possess him. Once he had his body, he found himself desiring his heart as well.

“Why don’t I ever get to see that cheap smile of yours?”
“You’ll never see me smile in front of you, even if I die.”

Taesin couldn’t understand why Han hated him so much, and Han couldn’t fathom Taesin’s obsession with him.

Thus, the tangled threads of a complex relationship began to weave between the two, as distant from the end of the world as they could be. Can these two people, who seem so far apart from the rest of the world, really be together?

item.title: After Retirement, Living a Stud Life in Another World
item.description: After drinking too much at my retirement celebration, I woke up to find myself inexplicably transformed into a beautiful young boy in another world. In this world where magic reigns supreme, there’s a catch – only women can use magic. The value of men lies in their ability to produce magically powerful offspring, recognized only through the demanding role of a ‘stud’ in a challenging setting. Somehow, when I engage in procreation, both the children and their mothers gain peculiar powers. Before I knew it, my surroundings were filled with women. Is this some kind of cheat?

item.title: Double Junk
item.description:
“I’ll pay a high price,” said Seokju, the boss of the Taeho faction, to the crippled gang member Ajin, marking the beginning of their relationship born out of a misunderstanding one night. “Like you have a leg disease. I have insomnia. Shall we help each other as patients?”
Using Seokju’s insomnia as an excuse, Ajin fell asleep in his embrace, becoming accustomed to his body temperature. “I want to work at your place until I die.” “Then just stay here. Here, in my room, sit on my knees. Let me bring the world to this room. But doubts keep sprouting, despite sealing the cracks of happiness.”
“Ajin, you can’t leave this room until you’ve paid off all your debts.” Now, this room became Ajin’s world, yet he found solace in the fact that Seokju didn’t abandon him.

item.title: The Young Male Protagonist Who is Destined for Ruin Fell for Me
Double Junk
item.description:
“I’ll pay a high price,” said Seokju, the boss of the Taeho faction, to the crippled gang member Ajin, marking the beginning of their relationship born out of a misunderstanding one night. “Like you have a leg disease. I have insomnia. Shall we help each other as patients?”
Using Seokju’s insomnia as an excuse, Ajin fell asleep in his embrace, becoming accustomed to his body temperature. “I want to work at your place until I die.” “Then just stay here. Here, in my room, sit on my knees. Let me bring the world to this room. But doubts keep sprouting, despite sealing the cracks of happiness.”
“Ajin, you can’t leave this room until you’ve paid off all your debts.” Now, this room became Ajin’s world, yet he found solace in the fact that Seokju didn’t abandon him.

item.title: After Retirement, Living a Stud Life in Another World
item.description: After drinking too much at my retirement celebration, I woke up to find myself inexplicably transformed into a beautiful young boy in another world. In this world where magic reigns supreme, there’s a catch – only women can use magic. The value of men lies in their ability to produce magically powerful offspring, recognized only through the demanding role of a ‘stud’ in a challenging setting. Somehow, when I engage in procreation, both the children and their mothers gain peculiar powers. Before I knew it, my surroundings were filled with women. Is this some kind of cheat?

item.title: After Transmigrating, I and the Female Lead Both Found It 'Really Fragrant' (GL)
item.description:
Synopsis:

Shen Qiqi, a prolific author of female-led novels, was known for her love of torturing the female leads in her stories. She would make the female leads suffer, become isolated, and ultimately turn to the dark side before making a triumphant return.

Never in her wildest dreams did she imagine she would be transported into one of her own novels, turning into a mediocre and vicious cannon fodder—a junior sister who delighted in bullying the female lead and was eventually hung on the city wall as punishment.

To survive, she decided to become a carefree and laid-back player, knowing and daring nothing. However, upon seeing the female lead for the first time, she instantly fell head over heels.

To shower the female lead with love and warmth, Shen Qiqi went out of her way to protect her:

* When the female lead was bullied by other vicious cannon fodder, she was the first to help her fight back.

* When the female lead was wronged, she felt heartbroken.

* When the female lead was pursued by a scumbag, she… broke them up!

Meanwhile, Liu Shuang had been reborn with a cold heart, viewing everyone around her as insignificant ants.

Fortunately, she still possessed the magic from her previous life. In this new life, everything remained unchanged except for her once arrogant and overbearing junior sister, who now revolved around her, showering her with flattery and affection.

Using her mind-reading ability, she overheard the junior sister’s thoughts:

“OMG, the female lead is so beautiful! I can do this!”

“My senior sister is kind, gentle, and understanding. No one can hurt her!”

“Senior sister, don’t be so saintly. You’ll be bullied by bad people!”

The Demon Lord Liu Shuang: ??? I’d rather jump off a building than believe Shen Qiqi again! … My junior sister is so cute, I’m so into her.

A carefree, optimistic, appearance-obsessed salted fish vs. a cold-on-the-outside-but-warm-on-the-inside, beautiful and powerful Demon Lord

1v1 HE, light-hearted and sweet

Synopsis:

Shen Qiqi, a prolific author of female-led novels, was known for her love of torturing the female leads in her stories. She would make the female leads suffer, become isolated, and ultimately turn to the dark side before making a triumphant return.

Never in her wildest dreams did she imagine she would be transported into one of her own novels, turning into a mediocre and vicious cannon fodder—a junior sister who delighted in bullying the female lead and was eventually hung on the city wall as punishment.

To survive, she decided to become a carefree and laid-back player, knowing and daring nothing. However, upon seeing the female lead for the first time, she instantly fell head over heels.

To shower the female lead with love and warmth, Shen Qiqi went out of her way to protect her:

* When the female lead was bullied by other vicious cannon fodder, she was the first to help her fight back.

* When the female lead was wronged, she felt heartbroken.

* When the female lead was pursued by a scumbag, she… broke them up!

Meanwhile, Liu Shuang had been reborn with a cold heart, viewing everyone around her as insignificant ants.

Fortunately, she still possessed the magic from her previous life. In this new life, everything remained unchanged except for her once arrogant and overbearing junior sister, who now revolved around her, showering her with flattery and affection.

Using her mind-reading ability, she overheard the junior sister’s thoughts:

“OMG, the female lead is so beautiful! I can do this!”

“My senior sister is kind, gentle, and understanding. No one can hurt her!”

“Senior sister, don’t be so saintly. You’ll be bullied by bad people!”

The Demon Lord Liu Shuang: ??? I’d rather jump off a building than believe Shen Qiqi again! … My junior sister is so cute, I’m so into her.

A carefree, optimistic, appearance-obsessed salted fish vs. a cold-on-the-outside-but-warm-on-the-inside, beautiful and powerful Demon Lord

1v1 HE, light-hearted and sweet

item.title: The Young Male Protagonist Who is Destined for Ruin Fell for Me
After Retirement, Living a Stud Life in Another World
item.description: After drinking too much at my retirement celebration, I woke up to find myself inexplicably transformed into a beautiful young boy in another world. In this world where magic reigns supreme, there’s a catch – only women can use magic. The value of men lies in their ability to produce magically powerful offspring, recognized only through the demanding role of a ‘stud’ in a challenging setting. Somehow, when I engage in procreation, both the children and their mothers gain peculiar powers. Before I knew it, my surroundings were filled with women. Is this some kind of cheat?

item.title: Quick Transmigration: The Villain Is Too Pampered and Alluring
item.nameextend: ***The Fake Daughter Will Not Be a Cannon Fodder 040***
item.description:
To survive, Sheng Nuan must traverse different worlds, playing the role of self-destructive cannon fodder while saving the darkest villains. These villains are cold-blooded, obsessive, and ruthless—capable of annihilating millions with a smile and destroying the world with a wave of their hand. Holding the cannon fodder’s script, Sheng Nuan is terrified…

Later:

A paranoid young man with a gloomy expression: “Nuan Nuan, you’re not allowed to go anywhere except by my side…”

The cold-blooded emperor whose face was stained with bl00d: “Nuan Nuan, for you, what does it matter if the empire falls?”

The demonized immortal with snow-white hair: “Nuan Nuan, you are my inner demon.”

The zombie king of the apocalypse with an unwavering gaze: “Nuan Nuan, it’s your choice—kill me, or save me.”

Sheng Nuan became even more panicked…

If you’re enjoying the story, please consider:

  1. Supporting the author
  2. Rating or leaving a review on NovelUpdates!

If you spot any mistakes in my translation, feel free to DM me on Discord (cannibalturtle) or report it in the Dragonholic Discord server. Join the server and get your role to get the fastest and most recent chapter release notifications and announcements.

Release schedule: Advance chapters will be updated daily at 8 PM (UTC+8).

If you love what I do, you can buy me coffee on ko-fi to show your support.

Shen Qiqi, a prolific author of female-led novels, was known for her love of torturing the female leads in her stories. She would make the female leads suffer, become isolated, and ultimately turn to the dark side before making a triumphant return.

Never in her wildest dreams did she imagine she would be transported into one of her own novels, turning into a mediocre and vicious cannon fodder—a junior sister who delighted in bullying the female lead and was eventually hung on the city wall as punishment.

To survive, she decided to become a carefree and laid-back player, knowing and daring nothing. However, upon seeing the female lead for the first time, she instantly fell head over heels.

To shower the female lead with love and warmth, Shen Qiqi went out of her way to protect her:

* When the female lead was bullied by other vicious cannon fodder, she was the first to help her fight back.

* When the female lead was wronged, she felt heartbroken.

* When the female lead was pursued by a scumbag, she… broke them up!

Meanwhile, Liu Shuang had been reborn with a cold heart, viewing everyone around her as insignificant ants.

Fortunately, she still possessed the magic from her previous life. In this new life, everything remained unchanged except for her once arrogant and overbearing junior sister, who now revolved around her, showering her with flattery and affection.

Using her mind-reading ability, she overheard the junior sister’s thoughts:

“OMG, the female lead is so beautiful! I can do this!”

“My senior sister is kind, gentle, and understanding. No one can hurt her!”

“Senior sister, don’t be so saintly. You’ll be bullied by bad people!”

The Demon Lord Liu Shuang: ??? I’d rather jump off a building than believe Shen Qiqi again! … My junior sister is so cute, I’m so into her.

* When the female lead was bullied by other vicious cannon fodder, she was the first to help her fight back.

* When the female lead was wronged, she felt heartbroken.

* When the female lead was pursued by a scumbag, she… broke them up!

Meanwhile, Liu Shuang had been reborn with a cold heart, viewing everyone around her as insignificant ants.

Fortunately, she still possessed the magic from her previous life. In this new life, everything remained unchanged except for her once arrogant and overbearing junior sister, who now revolved around her, showering her with flattery and affection.

Using her mind-reading ability, she overheard the junior sister’s thoughts:

“OMG, the female lead is so beautiful! I can do this!”

“My senior sister is kind, gentle, and understanding. No one can hurt her!”

“Senior sister, don’t be so saintly. You’ll be bullied by bad people!”

The Demon Lord Liu Shuang: ??? I’d rather jump off a building than believe Shen Qiqi again! … My junior sister is so cute, I’m so into her.

A carefree, optimistic, appearance-obsessed salted fish vs. a cold-on-the-outside-but-warm-on-the-inside, beautiful and powerful Demon Lord

1v1 HE, light-hearted and sweet

item.title: The Young Male Protagonist Who is Destined for Ruin Fell for Me
Zion's Garden
item.description:
Jung-won, born the son of a prostitute and now a doctor. Zion, molded into a top star by his father from birth. After losing his mother, Jung-won loses his purpose as a doctor, until an offer arrives: keep Zion alive until the end of his world tour. “Don’t think of it as being a doctor; think of it as making money.”

He vowed that after three months, it wouldn’t matter if Zion swallowed a bottle of sleeping pills or slit his wrists in the bathtub. But—
“No doctor gives drugs to a patient like that.” “You said you weren’t a doctor.”
The moment I saw my fallen angel, drugged and limp in the sprawling castle hidden deep in the mountains, I knew I shouldn’t have come here.

“A doctor can’t turn away poor Zion.” “I refuse. I refuse… I absolutely refuse, Kim Zion.”
My patient. My Zion. He knew from the start. He knew I would never be able to turn him away. If only I’d known it would end like this, would I have been kinder to you?

item.title: Quick Transmigration: The Villain Is Too Pampered and Alluring
item.nameextend: ***The Fake Daughter Will Not Be a Cannon Fodder 037***
item.description:
To survive, Sheng Nuan must traverse different worlds, playing the role of self-destructive cannon fodder while saving the darkest villains. These villains are cold-blooded, obsessive, and ruthless—capable of annihilating millions with a smile and destroying the world with a wave of their hand. Holding the cannon fodder’s script, Sheng Nuan is terrified…

Later:

A paranoid young man with a gloomy expression: “Nuan Nuan, you’re not allowed to go anywhere except by my side…”

The cold-blooded emperor whose face was stained with bl00d: “Nuan Nuan, for you, what does it matter if the empire falls?”

The demonized immortal with snow-white hair: “Nuan Nuan, you are my inner demon.”

The zombie king of the apocalypse with an unwavering gaze: “Nuan Nuan, it’s your choice—kill me, or save me.”

Sheng Nuan became even more panicked…

If you’re enjoying the story, please consider:

  1. Supporting the author
  2. Rating or leaving a review on NovelUpdates!

If you spot any mistakes in my translation, feel free to DM me on Discord (cannibalturtle) or report it in the Dragonholic Discord server. Join the server and get your role to get the fastest and most recent chapter release notifications and announcements.

Release schedule: Advance chapters will be updated daily at 8 PM (UTC+8).

If you love what I do, you can buy me coffee on ko-fi to show your support.

item.title: After Retirement, Living a Stud Life in Another World
item.description: After drinking too much at my retirement celebration, I woke up to find myself inexplicably transformed into a beautiful young boy in another world. In this world where magic reigns supreme, there’s a catch – only women can use magic. The value of men lies in their ability to produce magically powerful offspring, recognized only through the demanding role of a ‘stud’ in a challenging setting. Somehow, when I engage in procreation, both the children and their mothers gain peculiar powers. Before I knew it, my surroundings were filled with women. Is this some kind of cheat?

Somehow, when I engage in procreation, both the children and their mothers gain peculiar powers. Before I knew it, my surroundings were filled with women. Is this some kind of cheat?

item.title: After Retirement, Living a Stud Life in Another World
item.description: After drinking too much at my retirement celebration, I woke up to find myself inexplicably transformed into a beautiful young boy in another world. In this world where magic reigns supreme, there’s a catch – only women can use magic. The value of men lies in their ability to produce magically powerful offspring, recognized only through the demanding role of a ‘stud’ in a challenging setting. Somehow, when I engage in procreation, both the children and their mothers gain peculiar powers. Before I knew it, my surroundings were filled with women. Is this some kind of cheat?

item.title: The Goddess Granted Me the [Hatching] Skill and Somehow I Became the Strongest Tamer, Commanding Mythical and Divine Beasts
item.description:
Klaus, who was on the verge of death due to a high fever, met a goddess and was specially granted the ‘Hatching’ skill. When he regained consciousness, he found himself lying in bed surrounded by his parents and his younger sister, Celia.

Later, after various events, Klaus became an adventurer and discovered a large egg deep in the forest. When he hatched it, a phoenix emerged. For some reason, a familiar contract was automatically formed, along with the bonus of being able to use some of the familiar’s abilities. As Klaus fully manifested the true power of ‘Hatching’, he gradually began to attract attention among adventurers and eventually caught the eye of the nation…

item.title: Quick Transmigration: The Villain Is Too Pampered and Alluring
item.nameextend: ***The Fake Daughter Will Not Be a Cannon Fodder 034***
item.description:
To survive, Sheng Nuan must traverse different worlds, playing the role of self-destructive cannon fodder while saving the darkest villains. These villains are cold-blooded, obsessive, and ruthless—capable of annihilating millions with a smile and destroying the world with a wave of their hand. Holding the cannon fodder’s script, Sheng Nuan is terrified…

Later:

A paranoid young man with a gloomy expression: “Nuan Nuan, you’re not allowed to go anywhere except by my side…”

The cold-blooded emperor whose face was stained with bl00d: “Nuan Nuan, for you, what does it matter if the empire falls?”

The demonized immortal with snow-white hair: “Nuan Nuan, you are my inner demon.”

The zombie king of the apocalypse with an unwavering gaze: “Nuan Nuan, it’s your choice—kill me, or save me.”

Sheng Nuan became even more panicked…

If you’re enjoying the story, please consider:

  1. Supporting the author
  2. Rating or leaving a review on NovelUpdates!

If you spot any mistakes in my translation, feel free to DM me on Discord (cannibalturtle) or report it in the Dragonholic Discord server. Join the server and get your role to get the fastest and most recent chapter release notifications and announcements.

Release schedule: Advance chapters will be updated daily at 8 PM (UTC+8).

If you love what I do, you can buy me coffee on ko-fi to show your support.

item.title: After Transmigrating, I and the Female Lead Both Found It 'Really Fragrant' (GL)
item.description:
Synopsis:

Shen Qiqi, a prolific author of female-led novels, was known for her love of torturing the female leads in her stories. She would make the female leads suffer, become isolated, and ultimately turn to the dark side before making a triumphant return.

Never in her wildest dreams did she imagine she would be transported into one of her own novels, turning into a mediocre and vicious cannon fodder—a junior sister who delighted in bullying the female lead and was eventually hung on the city wall as punishment.

To survive, she decided to become a carefree and laid-back player, knowing and daring nothing. However, upon seeing the female lead for the first time, she instantly fell head over heels.

To shower the female lead with love and warmth, Shen Qiqi went out of her way to protect her:

* When the female lead was bullied by other vicious cannon fodder, she was the first to help her fight back.

* When the female lead was wronged, she felt heartbroken.

* When the female lead was pursued by a scumbag, she… broke them up!

Meanwhile, Liu Shuang had been reborn with a cold heart, viewing everyone around her as insignificant ants.

Fortunately, she still possessed the magic from her previous life. In this new life, everything remained unchanged except for her once arrogant and overbearing junior sister, who now revolved around her, showering her with flattery and affection.

Using her mind-reading ability, she overheard the junior sister’s thoughts:

“OMG, the female lead is so beautiful! I can do this!”

“My senior sister is kind, gentle, and understanding. No one can hurt her!”

“Senior sister, don’t be so saintly. You’ll be bullied by bad people!”

The Demon Lord Liu Shuang: ??? I’d rather jump off a building than believe Shen Qiqi again! … My junior sister is so cute, I’m so into her.

A carefree, optimistic, appearance-obsessed salted fish vs. a cold-on-the-outside-but-warm-on-the-inside, beautiful and powerful Demon Lord

1v1 HE, light-hearted and sweet

item.description:
Synopsis:

Shen Qiqi, a prolific author of female-led novels, was known for her love of torturing the female leads in her stories. She would make the female leads suffer, become isolated, and ultimately turn to the dark side before making a triumphant return.

Never in her wildest dreams did she imagine she would be transported into one of her own novels, turning into a mediocre and vicious cannon fodder—a junior sister who delighted in bullying the female lead and was eventually hung on the city wall as punishment.

To survive, she decided to become a carefree and laid-back player, knowing and daring nothing. However, upon seeing the female lead for the first time, she instantly fell head over heels.

To shower the female lead with love and warmth, Shen Qiqi went out of her way to protect her:

* When the female lead was bullied by other vicious cannon fodder, she was the first to help her fight back.

* When the female lead was wronged, she felt heartbroken.

* When the female lead was pursued by a scumbag, she… broke them up!

Meanwhile, Liu Shuang had been reborn with a cold heart, viewing everyone around her as insignificant ants.

Fortunately, she still possessed the magic from her previous life. In this new life, everything remained unchanged except for her once arrogant and overbearing junior sister, who now revolved around her, showering her with flattery and affection.

Using her mind-reading ability, she overheard the junior sister’s thoughts:

“OMG, the female lead is so beautiful! I can do this!”

“My senior sister is kind, gentle, and understanding. No one can hurt her!”

“Senior sister, don’t be so saintly. You’ll be bullied by bad people!”

The Demon Lord Liu Shuang: ??? I’d rather jump off a building than believe Shen Qiqi again! … My junior sister is so cute, I’m so into her.

A carefree, optimistic, appearance-obsessed salted fish vs. a cold-on-the-outside-but-warm-on-the-inside, beautiful and powerful Demon Lord

1v1 HE, light-hearted and sweet

item.title: The Second Son of The Marquis Runs Away from Home ~ Lacking Talent, He Abandons Everything and Becomes an Adventurer ~
item.description:
“I can’t take it anymore…”

Constantly compared to his prodigious elder brother, who is hailed as a genius, Serk strives relentlessly to earn recognition.

However, unable to bear it any longer, Serk reaches his breaking point and runs away not only from home but from the country itself. He becomes an adventurer in the land he escapes to, but…

item.title: Quick Transmigration: The Villain Is Too Pampered and Alluring
item.nameextend: ***The Fake Daughter Will Not Be a Cannon Fodder 031***
item.description:
To survive, Sheng Nuan must traverse different worlds, playing the role of self-destructive cannon fodder while saving the darkest villains. These villains are cold-blooded, obsessive, and ruthless—capable of annihilating millions with a smile and destroying the world with a wave of their hand. Holding the cannon fodder’s script, Sheng Nuan is terrified…

Later:

A paranoid young man with a gloomy expression: “Nuan Nuan, you’re not allowed to go anywhere except by my side…”

The cold-blooded emperor whose face was stained with bl00d: “Nuan Nuan, for you, what does it matter if the empire falls?”

The demonized immortal with snow-white hair: “Nuan Nuan, you are my inner demon.”

The zombie king of the apocalypse with an unwavering gaze: “Nuan Nuan, it’s your choice—kill me, or save me.”

Sheng Nuan became even more panicked…

If you’re enjoying the story, please consider:

  1. Supporting the author
  2. Rating or leaving a review on NovelUpdates!

If you spot any mistakes in my translation, feel free to DM me on Discord (cannibalturtle) or report it in the Dragonholic Discord server. Join the server and get your role to get the fastest and most recent chapter release notifications and announcements.

Release schedule: Advance chapters will be updated daily at 8 PM (UTC+8).

If you love what I do, you can buy me coffee on ko-fi to show your support.

item.title: After Transmigrating, I and the Female Lead Both Found It 'Really Fragrant' (GL)
item.description:
Synopsis:

Shen Qiqi, a prolific author of female-led novels, was known for her love of torturing the female leads in her stories. She would make the female leads suffer, become isolated, and ultimately turn to the dark side before making a triumphant return.

Never in her wildest dreams did she imagine she would be transported into one of her own novels, turning into a mediocre and vicious cannon fodder—a junior sister who delighted in bullying the female lead and was eventually hung on the city wall as punishment.

To survive, she decided to become a carefree and laid-back player, knowing and daring nothing. However, upon seeing the female lead for the first time, she instantly fell head over heels.

To shower the female lead with love and warmth, Shen Qiqi went out of her way to protect her:

* When the female lead was bullied by other vicious cannon fodder, she was the first to help her fight back.

* When the female lead was wronged, she felt heartbroken.

* When the female lead was pursued by a scumbag, she… broke them up!

Meanwhile, Liu Shuang had been reborn with a cold heart, viewing everyone around her as insignificant ants.

Fortunately, she still possessed the magic from her previous life. In this new life, everything remained unchanged except for her once arrogant and overbearing junior sister, who now revolved around her, showering her with flattery and affection.

Using her mind-reading ability, she overheard the junior sister’s thoughts:

“OMG, the female lead is so beautiful! I can do this!”

“My senior sister is kind, gentle, and understanding. No one can hurt her!”

“Senior sister, don’t be so saintly. You’ll be bullied by bad people!”

The Demon Lord Liu Shuang: ??? I’d rather jump off a building than believe Shen Qiqi again! … My junior sister is so cute, I’m so into her.

A carefree, optimistic, appearance-obsessed salted fish vs. a cold-on-the-outside-but-warm-on-the-inside, beautiful and powerful Demon Lord

1v1 HE, light-hearted and sweet

item.title: Quick Transmigration: The Villain Is Too Pampered and Alluring
item.nameextend: ***The Fake Daughter Will Not Be a Cannon Fodder 025***
item.description:
To survive, Sheng Nuan must traverse different worlds, playing the role of self-destructive cannon fodder while saving the darkest villains. These villains are cold-blooded, obsessive, and ruthless—capable of annihilating millions with a smile and destroying the world with a wave of their hand. Holding the cannon fodder’s script, Sheng Nuan is terrified…

Later:

A paranoid young man with a gloomy expression: “Nuan Nuan, you’re not allowed to go anywhere except by my side…”

The cold-blooded emperor whose face was stained with bl00d: “Nuan Nuan, for you, what does it matter if the empire falls?”

The demonized immortal with snow-white hair: “Nuan Nuan, you are my inner demon.”

The zombie king of the apocalypse with an unwavering gaze: “Nuan Nuan, it’s your choice—kill me, or save me.”

Sheng Nuan became even more panicked…

If you’re enjoying the story, please consider:

  1. Supporting the author
  2. Rating or leaving a review on NovelUpdates!

If you spot any mistakes in my translation, feel free to DM me on Discord (cannibalturtle) or report it in the Dragonholic Discord server. Join the server and get your role to get the fastest and most recent chapter release notifications and announcements.

Release schedule: Advance chapters will be updated daily at 8 PM (UTC+8).

If you love what I do, you can buy me coffee on ko-fi to show your support.

item.title: After Transmigrating, I and the Female Lead Both Found It 'Really Fragrant' (GL)
item.description:
Synopsis:

Shen Qiqi, a prolific author of female-led novels, was known for her love of torturing the female leads in her stories. She would make the female leads suffer, become isolated, and ultimately turn to the dark side before making a triumphant return.

Never in her wildest dreams did she imagine she would be transported into one of her own novels, turning into a mediocre and vicious cannon fodder—a junior sister who delighted in bullying the female lead and was eventually hung on the city wall as punishment.

To survive, she decided to become a carefree and laid-back player, knowing and daring nothing. However, upon seeing the female lead for the first time, she instantly fell head over heels.

To shower the female lead with love and warmth, Shen Qiqi went out of her way to protect her:

* When the female lead was bullied by other vicious cannon fodder, she was the first to help her fight back.

* When the female lead was wronged, she felt heartbroken.

* When the female lead was pursued by a scumbag, she… broke them up!

Meanwhile, Liu Shuang had been reborn with a cold heart, viewing everyone around her as insignificant ants.

Fortunately, she still possessed the magic from her previous life. In this new life, everything remained unchanged except for her once arrogant and overbearing junior sister, who now revolved around her, showering her with flattery and affection.

Using her mind-reading ability, she overheard the junior sister’s thoughts:

“OMG, the female lead is so beautiful! I can do this!”

“My senior sister is kind, gentle, and understanding. No one can hurt her!”

“Senior sister, don’t be so saintly. You’ll be bullied by bad people!”

The Demon Lord Liu Shuang: ??? I’d rather jump off a building than believe Shen Qiqi again! … My junior sister is so cute, I’m so into her.

A carefree, optimistic, appearance-obsessed salted fish vs. a cold-on-the-outside-but-warm-on-the-inside, beautiful and powerful Demon Lord

1v1 HE, light-hearted and sweet

“OMG, the female lead is so beautiful! I can do this!”

“My senior sister is kind, gentle, and understanding. No one can hurt her!”

“Senior sister, don’t be so saintly. You’ll be bullied by bad people!”

The Demon Lord Liu Shuang: ??? I’d rather jump off a building than believe Shen Qiqi again! … My junior sister is so cute, I’m so into her.

item.title: When I started High School, My Childhood Friend, who had suddenly become distant and cold, was harassed by a stranger. I stepped in to help, and as a result, from the following day, My Childhood Friend's behavior became unusual.
item.description:
“Right after being cheated on by my girlfriend, I ended up helping my childhood friend…

One morning, still unable to recover from the shock of my girlfriend’s betrayal, I was on the train when I noticed Shizune Aizawa, my childhood friend who had suddenly become distant when we entered high school, being harassed. I, Natsuki Sawatari, stepped in to help, and from that day forward, the distance between Shizune and me began to close, becoming even closer than our relationship had ever been before.

This is the story of two people who once drifted apart, finding their way back to each other and growing closer again.”

item.title: Quick Transmigration: The Villain Is Too Pampered and Alluring
item.nameextend: ***The Fake Daughter Will Not Be a Cannon Fodder 022***
item.description:
To survive, Sheng Nuan must traverse different worlds, playing the role of self-destructive cannon fodder while saving the darkest villains. These villains are cold-blooded, obsessive, and ruthless—capable of annihilating millions with a smile and destroying the world with a wave of their hand. Holding the cannon fodder’s script, Sheng Nuan is terrified…

Later:

A paranoid young man with a gloomy expression: “Nuan Nuan, you’re not allowed to go anywhere except by my side…”

The cold-blooded emperor whose face was stained with bl00d: “Nuan Nuan, for you, what does it matter if the empire falls?”

The demonized immortal with snow-white hair: “Nuan Nuan, you are my inner demon.”

The zombie king of the apocalypse with an unwavering gaze: “Nuan Nuan, it’s your choice—kill me, or save me.”

Sheng Nuan became even more panicked…

If you’re enjoying the story, please consider:

  1. Supporting the author
  2. Rating or leaving a review on NovelUpdates!

If you spot any mistakes in my translation, feel free to DM me on Discord (cannibalturtle) or report it in the Dragonholic Discord server. Join the server and get your role to get the fastest and most recent chapter release notifications and announcements.

Release schedule: Advance chapters will be updated daily at 8 PM (UTC+8).

If you love what I do, you can buy me coffee on ko-fi to show your support.

item.title: The Female Lead is Looking at Me Differently (GL)
item.description:
Synopsis:

Wen Zhao transmigrated into a low-magic Xianxia novel, only to discover she’d become the cannon fodder second female lead who bullied the female lead, seduced the male lead, and was generally a green tea b*tch, lotus-flower-like antagonist.

In the original novel, she was the catalyst for misunderstandings between the male and female leads, a dedicated tool character who lived until the grand finale. In the end, the male and female leads ended up together, while she suffered the consequences.

To avoid a bad ending, Wen Zhao tried her best to cling to the female lead without being too out of character, hoping to safely exit the story.

Although she was still being required by the system to perform actions befitting a second female lead, Wen Zhao believed the female lead would eventually understand her sincere heart!

However, it seemed like the female lead was looking at her a bit strangely?

••••

Male Lead: A Zhao, I suddenly realized that I might actually like you a little.

Wen Zhao: ???

She thought this was the biggest deviation from the plot, but then the female lead slowly approached.

Lowering her gaze slightly, the female lead, whose gaze was usually cold, revealed a hint of obsession and possessiveness. She walked up to Wen Zhao and smiled softly.

She asked softly, “A Zhao, between him and me, who do you choose?”

Wen Zhao: I choose you! I choose you!

••••

One-Sentence Summary: Thank you everyone, I’m with the female lead now.

Theme: Even when facing difficulties, one should strive to overcome them and have the determination to reverse their situation. Only through hard work can one achieve success. Victory and new surprises are waiting not far away.

Lowering her gaze slightly, the female lead, whose gaze was usually cold, revealed a hint of obsession and possessiveness. She walked up to Wen Zhao and smiled softly.

She asked softly, “A Zhao, between him and me, who do you choose?”

Wen Zhao: I choose you! I choose you!

••••

One-Sentence Summary: Thank you everyone, I’m with the female lead now.

Theme: Even when facing difficulties, one should strive to overcome them and have the determination to reverse their situation. Only through hard work can one achieve success. Victory and new surprises are waiting not far away.

item.title: The Female Lead is Looking at Me Differently (GL)
item.description:
Synopsis:

Wen Zhao transmigrated into a low-magic Xianxia novel, only to discover she’d become the cannon fodder second female lead who bullied the female lead, seduced the male lead, and was generally a green tea b*tch, lotus-flower-like antagonist.

In the original novel, she was the catalyst for misunderstandings between the male and female leads, a dedicated tool character who lived until the grand finale. In the end, the male and female leads ended up together, while she suffered the consequences.

To avoid a bad ending, Wen Zhao tried her best to cling to the female lead without being too out of character, hoping to safely exit the story.

Although she was still being required by the system to perform actions befitting a second female lead, Wen Zhao believed the female lead would eventually understand her sincere heart!

However, it seemed like the female lead was looking at her a bit strangely?

••••

Male Lead: A Zhao, I suddenly realized that I might actually like you a little.

Wen Zhao: ???

She thought this was the biggest deviation from the plot, but then the female lead slowly approached.

Lowering her gaze slightly, the female lead, whose gaze was usually cold, revealed a hint of obsession and possessiveness. She walked up to Wen Zhao and smiled softly.

Theme: Even when facing difficulties, one should strive to overcome them and have the determination to reverse their situation. Only through hard work can one achieve success. Victory and new surprises are waiting not far away.

item.title: Quick Transmigration: The Villain Is Too Pampered and Alluring
item.nameextend: ***The Fake Daughter Will Not Be a Cannon Fodder 019***
item.description:
To survive, Sheng Nuan must traverse different worlds, playing the role of self-destructive cannon fodder while saving the darkest villains. These villains are cold-blooded, obsessive, and ruthless—capable of annihilating millions with a smile and destroying the world with a wave of their hand. Holding the cannon fodder’s script, Sheng Nuan is terrified…

Later:

A paranoid young man with a gloomy expression: “Nuan Nuan, you’re not allowed to go anywhere except by my side…”

The cold-blooded emperor whose face was stained with bl00d: “Nuan Nuan, for you, what does it matter if the empire falls?”

The demonized immortal with snow-white hair: “Nuan Nuan, you are my inner demon.”

The zombie king of the apocalypse with an unwavering gaze: “Nuan Nuan, it’s your choice—kill me, or save me.”

Sheng Nuan became even more panicked…

If you’re enjoying the story, please consider:

  1. Supporting the author
  2. Rating or leaving a review on NovelUpdates!

If you spot any mistakes in my translation, feel free to DM me on Discord (cannibalturtle) or report it in the Dragonholic Discord server. Join the server and get your role to get the fastest and most recent chapter release notifications and announcements.

Release schedule: Advance chapters will be updated daily at 8 PM (UTC+8).

If you love what I do, you can buy me coffee on ko-fi to show your support.

item.title: After Transmigrating, I and the Female Lead Both Found It 'Really Fragrant' (GL)
item.description:
Synopsis:

Shen Qiqi, a prolific author of female-led novels, was known for her love of torturing the female leads in her stories. She would make the female leads suffer, become isolated, and ultimately turn to the dark side before making a triumphant return.

Never in her wildest dreams did she imagine she would be transported into one of her own novels, turning into a mediocre and vicious cannon fodder—a junior sister who delighted in bullying the female lead and was eventually hung on the city wall as punishment.

To survive, she decided to become a carefree and laid-back player, knowing and daring nothing. However, upon seeing the female lead for the first time, she instantly fell head over heels.

To shower the female lead with love and warmth, Shen Qiqi went out of her way to protect her:

* When the female lead was bullied by other vicious cannon fodder, she was the first to help her fight back.

* When the female lead was wronged, she felt heartbroken.

* When the female lead was pursued by a scumbag, she… broke them up!

Meanwhile, Liu Shuang had been reborn with a cold heart, viewing everyone around her as insignificant ants.

Fortunately, she still possessed the magic from her previous life. In this new life, everything remained unchanged except for her once arrogant and overbearing junior sister, who now revolved around her, showering her with flattery and affection.

Using her mind-reading ability, she overheard the junior sister’s thoughts:

“OMG, the female lead is so beautiful! I can do this!”

“My senior sister is kind, gentle, and understanding. No one can hurt her!”

“Senior sister, don’t be so saintly. You’ll be bullied by bad people!”

The Demon Lord Liu Shuang: ??? I’d rather jump off a building than believe Shen Qiqi again! … My junior sister is so cute, I’m so into her.

A carefree, optimistic, appearance-obsessed salted fish vs. a cold-on-the-outside-but-warm-on-the-inside, beautiful and powerful Demon Lord

1v1 HE, light-hearted and sweet

item.title: The Female Lead is Looking at Me Differently (GL)
item.description:
Synopsis:

Wen Zhao transmigrated into a low-magic Xianxia novel, only to discover she’d become the cannon fodder second female lead who bullied the female lead, seduced the male lead, and was generally a green tea b*tch, lotus-flower-like antagonist.

In the original novel, she was the catalyst for misunderstandings between the male and female leads, a dedicated tool character who lived until the grand finale. In the end, the male and female leads ended up together, while she suffered the consequences.

To avoid a bad ending, Wen Zhao tried her best to cling to the female lead without being too out of character, hoping to safely exit the story.

Although she was still being required by the system to perform actions befitting a second female lead, Wen Zhao believed the female lead would eventually understand her sincere heart!

However, it seemed like the female lead was looking at her a bit strangely?

••••

Male Lead: A Zhao, I suddenly realized that I might actually like you a little.

Wen Zhao: ???

She thought this was the biggest deviation from the plot, but then the female lead slowly approached.

Lowering her gaze slightly, the female lead, whose gaze was usually cold, revealed a hint of obsession and possessiveness. She walked up to Wen Zhao and smiled softly.

She asked softly, “A Zhao, between him and me, who do you choose?”

Wen Zhao: I choose you! I choose you!

••••

One-Sentence Summary: Thank you everyone, I’m with the female lead now.

Theme: Even when facing difficulties, one should strive to overcome them and have the determination to reverse their situation. Only through hard work can one achieve success. Victory and new surprises are waiting not far away.

In the original novel, she was the catalyst for misunderstandings between the male and female leads, a dedicated tool character who lived until the grand finale. In the end, the male and female leads ended up together, while she suffered the consequences.

To avoid a bad ending, Wen Zhao tried her best to cling to the female lead without being too out of character, hoping to safely exit the story.

Although she was still being required by the system to perform actions befitting a second female lead, Wen Zhao believed the female lead would eventually understand her sincere heart!

However, it seemed like the female lead was looking at her a bit strangely?

••••

Male Lead: A Zhao, I suddenly realized that I might actually like you a little.

Wen Zhao: ???

She thought this was the biggest deviation from the plot, but then the female lead slowly approached.

Lowering her gaze slightly, the female lead, whose gaze was usually cold, revealed a hint of obsession and possessiveness. She walked up to Wen Zhao and smiled softly.

She asked softly, “A Zhao, between him and me, who do you choose?”

Wen Zhao: I choose you! I choose you!

••••

One-Sentence Summary: Thank you everyone, I’m with the female lead now.

Theme: Even when facing difficulties, one should strive to overcome them and have the determination to reverse their situation. Only through hard work can one achieve success. Victory and new surprises are waiting not far away.

item.title: The Tyrant's Happy Ending
item.description:
BL fantasy novel set in a Western-style Omegaverse. It follows the story of Lyle Beltimore, a duke who rises to power after being betrayed by his first love, Yernen Helio, a prince who later becomes a tyrant. Lyle returns to the capital after years of war and finds Yernen dead.

However, Yernen reincarnates into the body of Prince Fortnum, Lyle’s new fiancé, and must now navigate his second life, torn between his past regrets and the possibility of a new future with Lyle.

Themes of love, betrayal, revenge, and redemption are central to the plot, with intense emotional struggles and a chance at a happy ending in Yernen’s second life.

item.title: Quick Transmigration: The Villain Is Too Pampered and Alluring
item.nameextend: ***The Fake Daughter Will Not Be a Cannon Fodder 013***
item.description:
To survive, Sheng Nuan must traverse different worlds, playing the role of self-destructive cannon fodder while saving the darkest villains. These villains are cold-blooded, obsessive, and ruthless—capable of annihilating millions with a smile and destroying the world with a wave of their hand. Holding the cannon fodder’s script, Sheng Nuan is terrified…

Later:

A paranoid young man with a gloomy expression: “Nuan Nuan, you’re not allowed to go anywhere except by my side…”

The cold-blooded emperor whose face was stained with bl00d: “Nuan Nuan, for you, what does it matter if the empire falls?”

The demonized immortal with snow-white hair: “Nuan Nuan, you are my inner demon.”

The zombie king of the apocalypse with an unwavering gaze: “Nuan Nuan, it’s your choice—kill me, or save me.”

Sheng Nuan became even more panicked…

If you’re enjoying the story, please consider:

  1. Supporting the author
  2. Rating or leaving a review on NovelUpdates!

If you spot any mistakes in my translation, feel free to DM me on Discord (cannibalturtle) or report it in the Dragonholic Discord server. Join the server and get your role to get the fastest and most recent chapter release notifications and announcements.

Release schedule: Advance chapters will be updated daily at 8 PM (UTC+8).

If you love what I do, you can buy me coffee on ko-fi to show your support.

item.title: The Female Lead is Looking at Me Differently (GL)
item.description:
Synopsis:

Wen Zhao transmigrated into a low-magic Xianxia novel, only to discover she’d become the cannon fodder second female lead who bullied the female lead, seduced the male lead, and was generally a green tea b*tch, lotus-flower-like antagonist.

In the original novel, she was the catalyst for misunderstandings between the male and female leads, a dedicated tool character who lived until the grand finale. In the end, the male and female leads ended up together, while she suffered the consequences.

To avoid a bad ending, Wen Zhao tried her best to cling to the female lead without being too out of character, hoping to safely exit the story.

Although she was still being required by the system to perform actions befitting a second female lead, Wen Zhao believed the female lead would eventually understand her sincere heart!

However, it seemed like the female lead was looking at her a bit strangely?

••••

Male Lead: A Zhao, I suddenly realized that I might actually like you a little.

Wen Zhao: ???

She thought this was the biggest deviation from the plot, but then the female lead slowly approached.

Lowering her gaze slightly, the female lead, whose gaze was usually cold, revealed a hint of obsession and possessiveness. She walked up to Wen Zhao and smiled softly.

She asked softly, “A Zhao, between him and me, who do you choose?”

Wen Zhao: I choose you! I choose you!

••••

One-Sentence Summary: Thank you everyone, I’m with the female lead now.

Theme: Even when facing difficulties, one should strive to overcome them and have the determination to reverse their situation. Only through hard work can one achieve success. Victory and new surprises are waiting not far away.
